3hmerwnontas t' Αgianniou, me thn aurio twn fwtwn, labame

Dwdeka meres kiolas eixame meis pio pisw, sta xwria.
Ki apanw pou sunh8ize t' auti mas pali sta gluka tri3imata
ths ghs, kai deila sullabizame to gabgisma tou skulou h ton

gurisoume sto mono axoloi pou 3erame: sto argo kai sto baru
twn kanoniwn, sto 3ero kai sto grhgoro twn polubolwn.

Nuxta panw sth nuxta badizame astamathta, enas pisw
ap' ton allo, idia tufloi. Me kopo 3ekollwntas to podari apo
th lasph, opou, fores, ekatobouliaze isame to gonato. Εpeidh
to pio suxna yixalize stous dromous e3w, ka8ws mes sthn yuxh

feggontas m' ena mikro dadi, mia-mia emoirazomastan th stafida.
H fores pali, an htan boleto, luname biastika ta rouxa kai
3unomastan me lussa wres polles, oso na tre3oun ta aimata.
Ti mas eixe anebei h yeira ws to laimo, ki htan auto pio ki ap' thn
kourash anupoferto. Telos, kapote, akougotane sta skoteina h
sfurixtra, shmadi oti kinousame, kai pali san ta za trabousame

stoxo t' aeroplana. Εpeidh o 8eos den katexe apo stoxous h
tetoia, ki opws to 'xe sunh8io tou, sthn idia pantote wra 3hmerwne
to fws.

Totes, xwmenoi mes stis rematies, gername to kefali apo to
meros to baru, opou de bgainoune oneira. Kai ta poulia mas
8umwnan, pou de diname taxa shmasia sta logia tous - isws kai
pou askhmizame xwris aitia thn plash. Αllhs loghs emeis xwriates,
m' allw logiw 3inaria kai siderika sta xeria mas, pou 3orkismena
na 'nai.

Dwdeka meres kiolas, eixame meis pio pisw sta xwria koita3ei
se ka8refth, wres polles, to guro tou proswpou mas. Ki apanw
pou sunh8ize 3ana to mati ta gnwrima palia shmadia, kai deila

na pou th deuterh th nuxta sampws pali allazame, thn trith akomh
pio polu, thn usterh, thn tetarth, pia fanero, den eimastan oi idioi.
Mone sa na phgainame mpoulouki anakato, 8arrouses, ap' oles tis
genies kai tis xronies, alloi twn twrinwn kairwn ki alloi polla paliwn, 
pou 'xan leukanei ap' ta perissia genia. Kapetanaioi agelastoi me to
kefalopani, kai papades 8eria, loxies tou 97 h tou 12, mpaltatzhdes
blosuroi panou ap' ton wmo seiwntas to peleki, apelates kai

Oloi mazi, dixws milia, xronous ametrhtous agkomaxwntas plai-plai,
diabainame tis raxes, ta faraggia, dixws na logariazoume allo tipote.
Giati ka8ws otan baroun apanwtes anapodies tous idious tous
an8rwpous panta, sunh8an sto Kako, telos tou allazoun onoma, to
len Grammeno h Moira - etsi ki emeis eproxwrousame isia panou s'

Ki oti hmastan sima polu sta merh opou den exei ka8hmerines

gia tsigaro. Ki opou san akougane gia pou trabousame, kounousan to

to podi autoi mes sth mesh ths aulhs twn probatwn. Kai idou panta gumnos
egw kai xwris poimnio kanena, stenazen o laos mou. Kai sta dontia tou
gualizen h arxaia peina, kai h yuxh tou etri3e panw sthn pikra ths ka8ws

troma3an. Εpeidh to ka8e shmadi kataleptws gnwrizoune kai suxna, milia

apathla pode8hkan. Kai misoi pianontas tous allous misous, apo to 'na
kai t' allo meros trabousane, tetoia logia legontas: a3ia kai kala ta erga
sas, kai oriste auth auth pou blepete h 8ura h kleisth ths aulhs twn
probatwn. Αshkwste to xeri kai mazi sas emeis, kai frontida dikh mas h
fwtia kai to sidero. Spitika mh fobaste, famelies mh lupaste, kai pote
se giou h patera h mikrou aderfou th fwnh, pisw mh kanete. Εide tuxei
kaneis apo sas ki h fobh8ei ki h luph8ei ki h kanei pisw, na 3erei: epanw
tou h fwtia pou ferame kai to sidero.
Kai to logo tous prin aposwsoun eixe parei n' allazei o kairos,
makria sto mauradi twn nefwn kai sima sto kopadi twn an8rwpwn. Sa na
perase ageras xamhla boggwntas kai n' apori3e adeia ta kormia, dixws

h ap' t' alla, po 'xoun th muth souglerh kai thn koyh a8era. Kai badizane

tipote. Mono ageras bouizontas mesa sta mesodokia kai sta liga kamena

Anaula efugan ta poulia...
k' egw ta xeria banw
sta Perasmena –sa fwlia
koufia, pou efugan ta poulia–
na zesta8oun apanw.

Twn rodwn twra to nero
n' alla3oun sto pothri,
mhde n' anoi3oun, karterw,
–me tetoion anemo kairo–
sto fws, sto para8uri.

Tou borria lampei h 3asteria
meres polles kai nuxtes
kai lamarines sth seira
xtupiountai –mprountzina ftera
skebra– ki' anemodeixtes...

Ma o hlios, pote pou anelei,
pote 3ana bourkwnei,
kapou, ntantella wxrh polu,
kapou, stauron ap' to guali
ston toixo 3eshkwnei.

K' h Elpida pali m' anika
kai thn 3anapisteuw,
kai t' akriba 8umhtika
kata ton hlio mustika,
sunazw kai swreuw.

Brexei– kai kan' h fusis
hxous toso glukous,
to diabasma n' afhshs
kai na sta8hs n' akous...

Stis skales, sto perboli,
sto guro ths fraghs
brexei gluka– kai s' olh
th xwra kai th ghs.

Brexei sta paramu8ia
k' ekei8e exoun er8ei
oi magoi oi aga8oi
me t' aspra geneia plh8eia.

Brexei sta paramu8ia...
k' ekei8e argofusa
t' ageri, apo dasa
8amna kai koufoli8ia.

Brexei– kai 3erei h fusis
notes toso glukes,
to fullo na tsakishs
me tis stixourgikes.

Sths lasphs t' akro xeilos,
lo3os kai serpetos,
diabainei o perittos
ths geitonias o skullos

kai tou peribolarh
h sousta oud' anthxei:
sa nanai se sfouggari
bouliazoun oi troxoi.

Apanw sth bitrina,
grammena sta gualia,
3eplenontai ta krina
kai ta triantafullia,

ma exei h pnoh fermena,
tou kampou, makruna,
ola t' alh8ina
ta futra, xortasmena!

Mallia xadiarika agoriou
– meta3i wxro, glustero atsali–
– k' upakouo, fronimo kefali
katw ap' th fouxta tou xeriou,

lugero, apanw se xlwmo,
lignon, xaritwmeno auxena
pou alussida malamatenia
zwnei kai peftei ws to laimo...

Kapoios zwgrafos 3akoustos,
polu pou 8axen agaphsei
ta neiata– autos sas exei afhsei,
8ampes klwstes, to xrwma auto,

les k' h8ele, gia wra pollh,
sth zwhn apanw na tupwsh
–latreia mesto kai mataih gnwsh―
to pio eftasfragisto fili!

Pio ataraxa apo matia! Esas
ana3ia skeyh de moleuei!
O akros a8eras sas saleuei
sa nanai agiazi kai fusa,

hmero, san tou perboliou
th xliarhn anasa, pou exoun
oi xlwrasies, san katabrexoun,
kata to gersimo tou hliou.

Mallia alafreia, san ths nuxtos
to xnwto, pou akrh sta klwnaria,
3epneei se xnoudia kai s' axnaria...
– egw poia xarh sas xrwstw!

Kamwmena gia tis euxes
ths afeshs mpros st' Agio Bhma
– omws ths eulogias to sxhma
to pio iero, ein' ap' tis yuxes

pou sparazoun mesa sto krima... 

– Kaiei to berniki· wsan apo kontuli
yilh, afrizei akoma h pinelia.
Ma esu exeis pali pureto sta xeilh,
pou serpoun na zhtoun ta pio palia!

Gia pes mou: etsi den 8elhses; Phgainw
to dromo pou me armhneues: Armo
pou naurhs na buza3hs to xameno
–twra– righlo teli twn lugmwn;

Esu, mpros stou Ierou, sa xtes akoma,
metalabaines to skali,
ki' ap' tou staurou to kruo fili
exeis to malama sto stoma.

Ki' omws twra stekomaste, apo panw,
–twra– se krima dixws 3agora:
ax, sth gnwmh sou emonoiasa: thn kanw
dikh mou, afou htan olh sou h xara!

Monon, auta ta kokkala mhn pianhs!
–kale mou! oude gia mena, oude gia se!–
Esu aloifhn eleous den pas na banhs:
ma n' anadeyhs nekres zestasies!

To 3erw t' asfalto axeili ti 8elei·
gia thn krufh plhgh me yaxnei,– ax mh!
(mh moudiasoun sto plhgwmeno teli
tou xamenou xinopwrou oi lugmoi!)

Aima 8a tre3h... Eisai a3ios, sa 8elhshs.
Omws giati 3ana me turanneis;
Tou elegxou kai ths steiras hdonhs
to farmaki diplo gia na m' afhshs;

Fraxths 3ulinos, paliou kissou antistuli,
kai se stoiba li8aria (ekei pou de 8arrouses
mia yuxh zwntanh) paidi, k' exei sta xeilh
organo, kai kremaei anaera tis patouses,
lignes patouses.

Sto zarwmeno to xarti, mia klwsth seietai
kai yuxh sthn klwsth, laloumenh, sto teli
logos, pou t' aluto pa8os polu dihgietai.
Kaneis kako, aga8o paidi, ma ti se mellei;
ax, ti se mellei;

Ki' o logos ki' o lugmos turannietai stis notes,
se mia fouxta mabu xarti mia trixa trizei...
Paize, aga8o paidi, tis rimes sou tis prwtes,
ki' as feugh opoios polu ponei kai den t' a3izei,
– kai den t' a3izei!

Feugei sta duo h fwnh mas sa fwnh sto xioni:
einai to diasthma polu, pou ws na bgh 8elei.
Swpaine, ein' o kahmos ba8us, ta logia skonh·
kallio lalei sta 3ena stomata to teli·
kallio to teli.

Ki' anasernei h gumnh, t' akous; tremousa trixa
sernei to einai ths ghs, to xwma, kai to fullo!
Pouli mes sthn kardia ths petras kai sthn yixa
ba8eia, kinaei pouli, sto xruso mesa 3ulo,
pouli sto 3ulo!

Kai s' eme (pou oso duo xeimwnies, toso, alh8eia,
to xruso touto makros kai to ageri tremw,
pou ap' ta nhsia olo pneei sta lampra 3eroli8ia
–armura noterh, gnwmh glukeia tou anemou,–)
s' eme, fwnh a3afna petietai mesa8e mou,
na kra3w stous kalous perastikous: «Boh8eia!»

Ma yuxh zwntanh de fainetai. Anemizoun,
petra thn petra, anwfeles agriobiolettes.
– Kai tetoia mustika san poies akoes t' a3izoun;
To pneuma, turannei· k' h xlwmh sarka, arnietai·
h sarka arnietai.

Ki' o logos ki' o lugmos apidromaei ki' ogkwnei
kai sa n' antimilh kai sa na bgazh glwssa,
pagainorxetai kai klaiei kai me dagkwnei
ki' olo kai meletaei thn krish ths ap' ta osa,
ta osa amarthse h kardia, kai metanoiwnei.

Ax, dakrua oso naurw, mou xanetai h yuxh·
giati ki' oude sfuri tuflo kai naxe pesei
sto nou mou, etsi pote den toxe auto xwresei,
to pou den paei 3ana na ginh ap' thn arxh!

– Taxa etsi na se geuwntai, riza tou kosmou;
Ylh laloumenh! ulh enteleia monaxh!
Krima tou Plasth sou, apraxth tou an8rwpou euxh,
mian ais8hsh, allh mia, gia na se smei3w dos mou,
akoma dos mou! 


Akra pantou hsuxia– kai thne perisseuoun
ta suntrexoumena nera gurw ap' th brush
k' oi pansedes, pou apoye oude stigmh saleuoun·
kai to koritsi pou epiase na tous potish.

Anh3erh 8wria sta matia me gelaei,
ki' afh, glukoperpathth dipla ap' tis alles·
pote, stala· kai pote, 8alassa– kai paei:
mia, stala· kai mia, 8alassas mabeies agkales,

anh3eros panses, mesa sthn pasa eirhnh,
xairetai, anais8htos, tou plasth tou to krima·
kai to geitoniko t' ageri opou ton ntunei,
ston iskio to tuligei ap' to diko tou entuma,

to entuma tou olo stales, mia mesa sthn allh,
k' iskiwma galano stou galanou th mesh,
ap' to lila kai s' allo pio lila, kai pali
– tou pagwniou ftera sa na8ele foresei.

Sfixtokratoumenos sths rizas tou to xwma
–ki' oso ton blepw, sto einai tou– na, pou mou moiazei!
Sa na m' akouh me to einai tou, ki' wsan, akoma,
me ta galazia matia tou na me skepazh...

K' erxetai, to louloudi, erxetai kai me smeigei
–k' einai sa na to mellh kai na mh to mellh–
sta mabeia tou me ntunei, me perituligei,
st' a3ebafa mabeia me ntunei, kai me 8elei.

To fullo kata mesa sthn kardia tou klinei
ki' agalia, me xwrei k' emena, oligo-oligo·
sta matia tou t' anh3era me katapinei
– kai stous pansedes mesa, enas panses anoigw.

Katw ap' tis elies, oi wres siwphles
pairnoune th mera pe8amenh.
Katw ap' tis lignes, tis skorpies agrielies,
afwno, pikro to leiyano diabainei.

Ax, th neioth sou, 3an8oula mou Erwmenh,
me thn wxra tou exei o 8anatos bammenh.

Mes sto agerino, pou feugei, deilino,
to portraito ths ston hlio pws xlwmainei!
Sure! Sth zwhn akomh n' agrupnw
– etsi moumellen, agaph staurwmenh!

3ebgalan th Mera pe8amenh.
Mas exwrisan, xlwmoula mou erwmenh!

K' ein' h nuxta pia, pou marturikia, 
gnwrimh, xwris musthrio, basileuei...
K' ein' h nuxta pia, pou krua kai plhxtikia,
sta ba8eia, ba8eia mou dunasteuei.

Akou: sigana paramilei ena fullo!
Kapoio fws mabu glustra ap' ta monopatia.
W yuxh mou, w sfalise ta matia!

Polukatoikhmeno einai to rafi
me tis glastres, phxta ta fulla, kai ta klwnia·
glastres ki' ws mes sthn petrinh, xamw, th skafh,
ki' o fukos, geitonas, skounta ta pelargonia.

To mousklo, belonia th belonia, kai briskei
pantou thn koufia riza na kataskepazh.
Des, k' h fragkosukia pou tremoun ths oi diskoi,
3wtikh sarka agka8erh, prasinh, moiazei.

K' e3afna, kapou edw sta xorta, h san pio pera,
fushma oligo kinhse na ta peira3h:
esugxuse alafra ton a8umon aera.
Xalaei ta fulla, biazetai, xalaei thn ta3h,

k' h staxterh, h perpathmenh h prasinada,
to melagxoliko koritsi pou diabazei,
ta hmerina ta marmara, h periplokada,
to spitiko peribolaki, sunnefiazei.

Muristika, potistika gurw ap' th brush,
parataira, esugklinan– k' e3anaka8hsan·
kati 3eno sa nar8e na sugkatoikhsh·
kai mia fouxta spourgitia omognwma eskorpisan...

Ma eleiye ki' olas. Ma htane mia apath akoma,
mouxrwma–k' eluwse, k' iskios aplhs hmeras.
Gia th sarka pikros, ax! pikros ki' ws to stoma,
tou prwtoxinopwrou perasen o ageras...

Me xwris fwtoxusies, m' oligous hxous
brexei, «epi dikaious kai adikous»...
brexei sthn plateia, sth fulakh,
– oikoumenikh broxh, euaggelikh.

Brexei sta bagonia (w eu8umia)
pou gurnane ap' ta Nosokomeia·
kai stis profhteies tou Kazamia
(«troph tou kairou pros noton... trikumia...»).

Brexei sta nera, brexei sta futra,
brexei stis gazies sou, ma8htra!
Brexei– tupika, kai dixws shmasia...
Brexei stis ma8htres sou, gazia!

Stou kenou ton kuklo katebainei
ths broxhs sou h sunefaptomenh...
St' ouranou th mataihn agkalia
trigwna, ta e3orista poulia.

Xinopwrines Ishmeries
(w oi broxes, w oi trigwnometries!).
Kai na mh mporw (me sugxwreis)
na sou ma8w ekeina pou aporeis.

Brexei, Kuriakh... Kaneis, kaneis,
allo apo «gnwstous» kai «suggeneis»...
Krimas th xara, krimas th sxolh!
Den exei sergiani sto perboli,

pou 8a pagainorxetai, skuftos,
sto staxti to mousama tou A u t o s !

Oi stixoi autoi mporei kai na 'nai oi teleutaioi
Oi teleutaioi stous teleutaious pou 8a graftoun
Giati oi melloumenoi poihtes de zoune pia
Autoi pou 8a milousane pe8anan oloi neoi
Ta 8libera tragoudia tous genhkane poulia
Se kapoion allon ourano pou lampei 3enos hlios
Genhkan agrioi potamoi kai trexoune sth 8alassa
Kai ta nera tous den mporeis na 3exwriseis
Sta 8libera tragoudia tous futrwse enas lwtos
Na gennh8oume sto xumo tou emeis pio neoi.

Pe8anes- ki egines kai su: o kalos,
O lampros an8rwpos, o oikogeneiarxhs, o patriwths.
Trianta e3h stefana se sunodeyane, treis logoi 
                                    antiproedrwn,
Efta yhfismata gia tis uperoxes uphresies pou 
                                    proseferes.

A, re Laurenth, egw pou mono to3era ti ka8arma hsoun,
Ti kalpikos paras, mia oloklhrh zwh mesa sto yema
Koimou en eirhnh, den 8a 'r8w thn hsuxia sou na tara3w.
(Egw, mia oloklhrh zwh mes sth siwph 8a thn e3agorasw
Polu akriba ki oxi me timhma to 8libero sou to sarkio.)
Koimou en eirhnh. Ws hsoun panta sth zwh: o kalos,
O lampros an8rwpos, o oikogeneiarxhs, o patriwths.

De 8a 'sai o prwtos oute da ki o teleutaios. 

Ena ka8e bdomada, 
sthn orismenh mera, 
panta sthn idian wra, 
tria baporia wraia, 
h “Kleopatra”, h “Semiramis” k’ h “8eodwra”, 
anoigountai ap’ thn prokumaia 
stis ennea, 
panta gia ton Peraia, 
to Mprintizi kai to Triesti, 
panta. 

Xwris manoubres k’ eligmous 
kai distagmous 
ki’ anwfela sfurigmata, 
strefoune st’ anoixta thn prwra, 
h “Kleopatra”, h “Semiramis” k’ h “8eodwra”, 
san kapoioi kaloana8remmenoi 
pou feugoun apo ena saloni 
xwris anousies xeirayies 
kai perittes. 

Anoigountai ap’ thn prokumaia 
stis ennea, 
panta gia ton Peraia, 
to Mprintizi kai to Triesti, 
panta –kai me to kruo kai me th zesth. 

Pane 
na mountzourwsoun ta galazia 
tou Aigaiou kai ths Mesogeiou 
me tous kapnous twn. 
Pane gia na skorpisoune topazia 
ta fwta tous mes’ sta nera 
th nuxta. 
Pane 
panta m’ an8rwpous kai mpagkazia… 

H “Kleopatra”, h “Semiramis” k’ h “8eodwra”, 
xronia twra, 
kanoun ton idio dromo, 
ftanoun thn idia mera, 
feugoun sthn idian wra. 

Moiazoun upallhloi grafeiwn 
pou ginane xronometra, 
pou h porta ths douleias, 
an den tous dei mia mera na perasoun 
apo katw ths, 
mporei na pesei. 

(Otan o dromos einai panta idios 
ti taxa an einai se mia oloklhrh Mesogeio 
h ap’ to spiti s’ allh sunoikia;) 
H “Kleopatra”, h “Semiramis” k’ h “8eodwra” 
einai kairos kai xronia pane twra 
tou baremou pou enoiwsan thn turannia, 
na perpatoun panta ston idio dromo, 
na denoune panta sta idia limania. 

An hmoun egw ploiarxos, 
nai –si j’etais roi!– 
an hmoun egw ploiarxos 
sthn “Kleopatra”, th “Semiramh”, th “8eodwra”, 
an hmoun egw ploiarxos 
me tessera xrusa galonia 
ki an m’ afhnan sthn idia auth grammh 
tosa xronia, 
mia nuxta selhnofeggh, 
sth mesh tou pelagou, 
8’ anebaina sto tetarto katastrwma 
ki enw 8’ akougountan h mousikh 
pou 8a’ paize sths prwths 8eshs ta salonia, 
me th megalh mou stolh, 
me ta xrusa mou ta galonia 
kai ta xrusa mou ta parashma, 
8a’ grafa mian armonikotath kampulh 
apo to tetarto katastrwma 
mes’ sta nera, 
etsi me ta xrusa mou, 
san asthr diattwn 
san hrws ane3hghtwn 8anatwn. 

1

Egw pou agapw tis nuxtes ws thn augh
bre8hka sto 3ediplwma mias allhs nuxtas
ki exw pia thn eikona ths na thn koitazw,
ta poulia mono leipoun, fantasmata,
ma ta 8umamai san troma3an
ki hr8an sth gefura gurw mou,

tis mikres tromagmenes fwnes tous akouw
3anablepontas to mproutzino xrwma pou ta petrwse
kai thn asprh san ebaye etsi foresia mou.
Notismenos mes sthn augh koitaza
sta ka8hmerina mou to fainomeno
otan esu thn idia stigmh
sto Sounio pou 'grafes
to fws ekeino sto skotadi,
stis eikones tous
se anamnhsh.
Eitan auta stis 19/6/35
anamesa 5 kai 6.40΄ to prwi.―

An8isa gurw mou sth 8alassa

to katarti pou sou gnwrise
to gurismo mas;

(ki h yuxh mas

h amartia mas.

Nai gia mena monon ena: Esu
se xilia spasmena ma astraftera kommatia ka8refth.
Sto fws to hremo ―mhn peis pws den to kerdisa―
ths skeyhs opou m' odhgas·
twra

me xilia alla tosa logia 3espw

O enas plai ston allo sta8hkan

gh diyasmenh, akarph

―exontas thn antoxh mono sth 8umhsh perasmenwn;―

fwna3a me8usmenos: to prwto rodo! kai mesa mou

Etsi sou sunexizoume twra to gramma mas,
Duskolh kai xwris elpida! ―gi' auto dokimazw th fwnh mou,

Ths mona3ias o upnos miso8anatos·
gurizei tis eikones diyasmena oneira,
ein' o bu8os ta xrwmata...

Tous gnwrisa apo palia grammata tous·

tis 3anabrhka tote

W, pes mou an den pisteueis akomh ta fantasmata!
t' aloga pou exoun ftera gia paramu8enious topous,

ta mallia tou htan o hlios gia to skoteino mas purgo.
Ma ti lew! Esu den eisai 3an8h kai twra

olos gia na uparxw m' esena·
des auto to xeri krataei
ston agwna tou th moira
ta bouna metatopizei
ki astra paignidia sta xeria sou api8wnei...

Otan blepw kapoion na perpath epanw-katw, opws o makariths o Ber8eros, kai na meleta mian erwtikhn ekdikhsin, legw apo mesa mou: «Idou enas an8rwpos, pou etoimazetai na kamh mian anohsian!».
    Ka8enas thn kamnei me ton tropon tou. Allos foneuei. Alla o 8anatos einai musthrion. Allos autoktonei. Alla h autoktonia einai mia hli8ioths. Allos speudei na upandreu8h me to prwton adespoton 8hlu, pou sunanta eis ton dromon tou, fantazomenos oti ekdikeitai me ton tropon auton ekeinhn, pou epause na ton agapa. Auto einai 3ekardistikh kwmwdia. Allos grafei ena drama, eis to opoion kauthriazei tas gunaikas me pepuraktwmenon sidhron. Autos, aploustata ma3ilarwnetai. Yphr3en enas an8rwpos, o opoios, dia na ekdikh8h thn gunaika tou, kathrghsen, en stigmh paraforas, to fulon tou me thn maxairan tou dhmiou. Me auton geloun oi aiwnes. Kaneis, me mian le3in, den esta8h ikanos na ekdikh8h epa3iws mian gunaika eis ton kosmon auton.
    To pragma einai eue3hghton. Oloi oi ekdikhtai ths gunaikeias apistias energoun m' ena tropon esfalmenon eis thn basin tou. Energoun dhladh m' ena tropon uperbolika sobaron kai polu suxna tragikon. Protimoun thn tragwdian ekei, opou kat' e3oxhn 8a hto endedeigmenh h farsa. Ypoduontai ton ko8ornon tou tragwdou, enw o akatallhloteros an8rwpos dia na pai3h ena sobaron rolon eis to 8eatron ths zwhs einai o atuxhsas erasths. Kai, enw oregetai tas dafnas enos Talma, dexetai ta ma3ilaria ths plateias epi ths kefalhs tou. 
    Di' auto akribws oi sofwteroi den peripatoun pia epanw-katw, meta thn prodosian h thn egkataleiyin, opws o makariths Ber8eros, kai den meletoun mian ekdikhsin. Shkwnontai apo to geuma, opou emisoteleiwsan to fagi twn, skoupizoun to stoma twn me thn petsetan, plhrwnoun kai feugoun, ws na mh tous sunebh tipote, afinontes enan allon n' apoteleiwsh thn merida twn. Etsi diaswzoun thn a3ioprepeian twn, xwris na meinoun kai entelws anekdikhtoi. Dioti gnwrizoun oti einai entelws peritton na ekdikhtai ka8enas xwrista thn aiwnian gunaika. Di' authn uparxoun oi ek 8eou apestalmenoi ekdikhtai, pou einai oi Don Zouan olwn twn topwn kai olwn twn epoxwn, kai oi opoioi den kamnoun allo, para na ekdikountai diarkws dia ton eauton tous kai dia tous allous. 
    En toutois, ofeilomen na kamwmen timhtikhn e3airesin dia ton an8rwpon, o opoios pro oligwn hmerwn epragmatopoihse prwtotupon ekdikhsin eis thn Akropolin authn ths koinotopias, pou einai ai A8hnai. Eidate apo tas efhmeridas, ti ekamen o megalofuhs autos. Ephge nukta eis thn 8uran ths apistou kai ths etoixokollhse mian epigrafhn: «Edw uparxei eulogia». Tipote allo! To allo prwi oi diabatai epernousan, estamatousan, ediabazan kai efeugan entromoi makrua. O galatas den ektuphse thn 8uran ekeino to prwi. O manabhs den estamathsen. O grammatokomisths, pou eferne mian erwtikhn epistolhn, thn e3anabalen eis ton sakkon tou kai efugen. O neos erasths, molis eplhsiasen eis thn gwnian tou dromou kai prin parelash akomh upo to 8rulikon para8uron, anekrouse me tropon prumnan kai den efanh pleon. Otan h apistos antelhf8h thn sumforan kai esteile na 3esxisoun thn katax8onian epigrafhn, hto pleon arga. O prodo8eis erasths eixen ekdikh8h! Kai eixen ekdikh8h kuriws, dioti h apistos ton efantazeto 3ekardismenon apo ta gelia eis mian gwnian tou dromou, en w 8a h8ele na ton fantas8h aphgxonismenon apo thn orofhn tou dwmatiou tou.
    Otan ton erwthsan eis thn Astunomian, diati proebh eis thn a8lian authn pra3in, legoun oti apekri8h afelestata:
    ― H8ela na ths steilw th blogia sta omorfa moutrakia ths. Afou den mporousa na to kamw, ths thn esteila sthn porta ths. As mpolias8h na einai hsuxh!
    Kai h Astunomia apeluse ton erasthn kai esteile ton astuiatron na emboliash thn erwmenhn, dia ka8e endexomenon kai dia thn hsuxian ths sunoikias. H farsa kai h ekdikhsis elabe toioutotropws thn wraian ths sunexeian.

O Straths to stoixeio –etsi akougotane twra s' olo to nhsi, xronia kai xronia– den agapouse ton kosmo kai zouse pant' alarga ap' tous an8rwpous. Apo paidi moutsos sta Skopelitika karabia kai pio ustera nauths kai lostromos kai kapetanios, kai twr' akoma, pouxe parathsei tis 8alasses, geros ogdontarhs, ki epiase tous gialous, me th mikrh tou yarobarka, th «Maxw» –ths monaxokorhs tou t' onoma– den allaze ola ta kala tou kosmou me th mona3ia tou. Etsi tou kollhse kai to paranomi. O Straths to Stoixeio me t' onoma. Wstos' o Straths den htane kai toso monaxos, sth mona3ia tou. Eixe tous suntrofous tou. Ki an den tous eblepe o kosmos, ti taxa; O Straths gelouse apo mesa tou. «Ta matia tou kosmou, sa den einai straba, alloi8wrizoun, elege kapote me ton eauto tou. Liga pramata blepome me ta matia mas. Ki osa de blepome, einai ta perissotera». Kai san akouge to paranomi tou elege mesa tou perhfanos: «Stoixeio kai me ta stoixeia zw...».
    O Straths sth mona3ia tou eixe tous kaluterous suntrofous tou kosmou. Kai pws alliws; An8rwpos de sta8hke, pou na mporei na zhsei monaxos tou. Oute ta stoixeia, t' alh8ina stoixeia. Ki o pio erhmos akoma, kai stou bounou thn korfh kai sth mesh tou pelagou na ton baleis, ka8e yuxh, ka8e agrimi stou loggou ta ba8eia, kai to kayalismeno dendro, katameshs tou kampou, briskei ton suntrofo tou. Polles fores ekane me to nou tou th sullogh touth o Straths to Stoixeio, otan akouge apopisw tou ta logia tou kosmou. Ma o kosmos einai strabos, elege. Me o,ti blepei milaei.
    ― Monaxa mesa stous an8rwpous mporei na bre8h kanenas alh8ina erhmos, sullogizotane. Tetoia mona3ia mporei na sou ferei trella! Makrua ap' tous an8rwpous, briskei panta kanenas ton suntrofo tou. Kai taxa monaxa oi an8rwpoi einai suntrofoi mas; Ena zwntano, ena skuli, ena gati, ena petoumeno einai kapoies fores kaluteroi suntrofoi ap' tous an8rwpous. Kai monaxa touta; Ena dendro, enas braxos, ena koutsouro akoma. Tous milas kai sou miloune. T' agapas kai s' agapoune. Tufla naxoune oi an8rwpoi kai ta kala tous. 
    Wstos' o Straths to Stoixeio mhte tetoio suntrofo den eixe kanena. Oute skuli, oute gati, oute zwntano, out' ena koutsouro akoma.
    To koritsi tou, to Maxw, th monakribh tou, thn eixe apo mikrh se mia gerontissa, pou thn eixe ana8reyei orfanoula. Sth xash kai th fe3h thn eblepe, ta podia tou de bastousane n' anebainei suxna apanw sto xwrio kai to ywmi tou htane katw sto gialo. Ma h agaph kai h laxtara ths htane panta mazi tou. Kai me auth bastiotane ston kosmo.
    ― Ki h egnoia ki h agaph suntrofoi mas einai, elege monaxos tou. Ki oi kaluteroi mas suntrofoi. Autoi ki o Straths. Ton 3erw kai me 3erei. Tou milw kai mou milei. Mallwnome ki agapizome. Ws pou na kleisome ta matia kai na xwrisome gia panta.
    Etsi ka8e bradi, sa mageireue kanena yaraki mes sth barka tou kai trabouse kai thn tsotra tou, ebaze kefi o Straths me ton Strath, kai 3aplwmenos apanw sto prumnio skamni anaskela, koitaze t' astra t' ouranou ki arxize thn koubenta me ton eauto tou kai me tis egnoies tou. Pernousane oi wres, xwris na tis katalabainei. Ki otan katebaine gluka o upnos apo t' astra kai tou glukosfalouse ta matia, ekane to stauro tou ki apoxairetouse to filo tou: «Polla eipame, Strath. Wra gia upno, kalhnuxta». Epairne mia ba8eia anapnoh ki exane ton kosmo. Ta kumatakia ton nanourizane me ta filia tous: «Kalhnuxta, Strath, kalhnuxta...»
    Ena magiatiko bradi, xara 8eou, pou t' asteria eixane plh8unei ston ourano –muriades astra eixane probalei ekeino to bradi ap' oles tis meries kai strimwnontan trella to ena konta sto allo, na xaroune thn omorfh nuxta– o Straths eixe glenti san panta. Olh h tsotra egine 8usia ekeino to bradi. «Traba, Strath, allh mian akoma na pane ta farmakia katw». Kai trabousane o Straths me ton Strath. San estrwse kai 3aplw8hke kai trabh3e ki ena tsimpoukaki, edese ta xeria pisw ap' to kefali ki arxise thn koubenta:
    ― Kala perasame kai shmera, Strath.
    ― Do3a soi o 8eos!
    ― Gia koita t' asteria, Strath. Smari t' asteria apoye. Gemisane ta ourania. Ki olo fanerwnontai kainourgia. Olo bgainoune kai teleiwmo den exoune.
    ― Les ki exei panhguri sta yhla o gero-8eos. Ola tou t' asteria tabgale o3w, den afhse kanena apoye.
    ― Kairos gi' armenisma, Strath. San exeis tetoia astrofeggia, ti na to kaneis to feggari; Apisto prama. Sou rixnei staxth sta matia. Sou mperdeuei tis steries, sou anakateuei ola ta panta. Les kai kanei magia apanw stis 8alasses kai mageuei tous marnerous. Ana8ema to! Duo fores nauaghsame me to feggari. Strath, to 8umasai;
    ― To 8umamai, leei; H 8umhsh mas apomeine... Kai den einai, pou 8a se fane ta yaria, mono 8a sou poune kai tufla. Kai 8a gelaei kai to feggari apo panw sou. Eides, alh8eia, pws gelaei to feggari kammia fora;

    O Straths tentwse ta xeria tou kai 3eraxamnisthe. 8umh8hke ta xronia pou perasane. Mia zwh apanw sth 8alassa, saranta tosa xronia. Efage to salado me to kantari, me to xouliari hpie th 8alassa. Fourtounes, mpounatses, karabotsakismata, pelaga, wkeanoi, politeies, xares, lupes, laxtares, apo8umies, xaropalemata kai panhguria.     ― Kai ti apolayame, Strath; Tipote.

    ― San paramu8i, Strath, san 3eno paramu8i.

    ― O 8eos na dwsei, Strath.
    ― Paei na mara8h to kahmeno to koritsi! Ena mou t' afhse h manna tou, san efuge. Mazi fugame sto ta3idi. Egw 3anagurisa, ki ekeinh –8eos sxwres' thn!– den 3anagurise pia. Brhke kalutera kai mas afhse. Ti na genei; Eipa ki egw na m' a3iwsei o 8eos na to pantreyw, na to bloghsw, na piasw paidi ap' ta xeria tou, na xarh ki ekeinh ekei pou brisketai. HPAKLEITOS 

Me thn patrida tous demenh sta pania kai ta koupia ston anemo kremasmena 
Oi nauagoi koimh8hkan hmeroi san agrimia nekra mesa stwn sfouggariwn ta sentonia 
Alla ta matia twn fukiwn einai stramena sth 8alassa 
Mhpws tous 3anaferei o notias me ta freskobamena latinia 
Ki enas xamenos elefantas a3izei pantote pio polu apo duo sth8ia koritsiou pou saleuoun 
Mono n' anayoune sta bouna oi steges twn erhmokklhsiwn me to meraki tou aposperith 
Na kumatisoune ta poulia sths lemonias ta katartia 
Me ths kainourgias perpathsias to sta8ero aspro fushma 
Kai tote 8a 'r8oun aerhdes swmata kuknwn pou meinane aspiloi truferoi kai akinhtoi 
Mes stous odostrwthres twn magaziwn mesa stwn laxanokhpwn tous kuklwnes 
Otan ta matia twn gunaikwn ginan karbouna ki espasan oi kardies twn kastanadwn 
Otan o 8erismos estamathse ki arxisan oi elpides twn grulwn. 


Gi' auto loipon ki eseis pallhkaria mou me to krasi ta filia kai ta fulla sto stoma sas 
8elw na bgeite gumnoi sta potamia 
Na tragoudhste th Mparmparia opws o 3ulourgos kunhgaei tous skinous 
Opws pernaei h oxentra mes ap' ta peribolia twn kri8ariwn 
Me ta perhfana matia ths orgismena 
Ki opws oi astrapes alwnizoun ta niata. 


Kai mh gelas kai mhn klais kai mh xairesai 
Mh sfiggeis adika ta papoutsia sou sa na futeueis platania 
Mh ginesai PEPPWMENON 
Giati den einai o staurahtos ena kleismeno surtari 
Den einai dakru koromhlias oute xamogelo noufarou 
Oute fanela peristeriou kai mantolino Soultanou 
Oute meta3wth foresia gia to kefali ths falainas. 
Einai prioni 8alassino pou petsokobei tous glarous 
Einai proskefalo maragkou einai roloi zhtianou 
Einai fwtia s' ena guftiko pou koroideuei tis papadies kai nanourizei ta krina 
Einai twn Tourkwn sumpe8erio twn Australwn panhguri 
Einai lhmeri twn Ouggrwn 
Pou to xinopwro oi fountoukies pane krufa ki antamwnountai 
Blepoun tous fronimous pelargous na bafoun maura t' auga tous 
Kai tone klaine ki autes 
Kaine ta nuxtika tous kai foroun to misofori ths papias 
Strwnoun asteria kataghs gia na pathsoun oi basiliades 
Me t' ashmenia tous xaimalia me thn korwna kai thn porfura 
Skorpane dentrolibano stis bragies 
Gia na perasoun oi pontikoi na pane s' allo kellari 
Na mpoune s' alles ekklhsies na fan tis Agies Trapezes 
Ki oi koukoubagies paidia mou 
Oi koukoubagies ourliazoune 
Ki oi pe8amenes kalogries shkwnountai na xoreyoun 
Me ntefia toumpana kai biolia me pipizes kai lagouta 
Me flampoura kai me 8umiata me botana kai magnadia 
Me ths arkoudas to braki sthn pagwmenh koilada 
Trwne ta manitaria twn kounabiwn 
Paizoun korwna-grammata to daxtulidi t' Ah-Gianniou kai ta flouria tou Araph 
Perigelane tis magisses 
Koboun ta genia enos papa me tou Kolokotrwnh to giatagani 
Louzontai mes sthn axnh tou libaniou 
Ki ustera yelnontas arga mpainoun 3ana sth gh kai swpainoun 
Opws swpainoun ta kumata opws o koukos th xaraugh opws o luxnos to bradu. 


Etsi s' ena pi8ari ba8u to stafuli 3erainetai kai sto kampanario mias sukias kitrinizei to mhlo 
Etsi me mia grabata fantaxterh 
Sthn tenta ths klhmatarias to kalokairi anasainei 
Etsi koimatai ologumnh mesa stis aspres kerasies mia truferh mou agaph 
Ena koritsi amaranto sa mugdalias klwnari 
Me to kefali ston agkwna ths gerto kai thn palamh panw sto flouri ths 
Panw sthn prwinh tou 8alpwrh otan siga-siga san ton klefth 
Apo to para8uri ths anoi3hs mpainei o augerinos na thn 3upnhsei! 




Lene pws tremoun ta bouna kai pws 8umwnoun ta elata 
Otan h nuxta rokanaei tis prokes twn keramidiwn na mpoun oi kalikantzaroi mesa 
Otan roufaei h kolash ton afrismeno mox8o twn xeimarrwn 
H otan h xwristra ths piperias ginetai tou boria klwtsoskoufi. 


Mono ta bodia twn Axaiwn mes sta paxia libadia ths 8essalias 
Boskoun akmaia kai dunata me ton aiwnio hlio pou ta koitazei 
Trwne xortari prasino fulla ths leukas selina pinoune ka8aro nero mes st' aulakia 
Murizoun ton idrwta ths ghs ki ustera peftoune baria katw ap' ton iskio ths itias na koimh8oune.


Petate tous nekrous eip' o Hrakleitos ki eide ton ourano na xlwmiazei 
Ki eide sth lasph duo mikra kuklamina na filiountai 
Ki epese na filhsei ki autos to pe8ameno swma tou mes sto filo3eno xwma 
Opws o lukos katebainei ap' tous drumous na dei to yofio skuli kai na klayei. 
Ti na mou kamei h stalagmatia pou lampei sto metwpo sou; 
To 3erw panw sta xeilia sou egraye o keraunos t' onoma tou 
To 3erw mesa sta matia sou extise enas ahtos th fwlia tou 
Ma edw sthn oxth thn ugrh mono enas dromos uparxei 
Mono enas dromos apathlos kai prepei na ton peraseis 
Prepei sto aima na bouthxteis prin o kairos se proftasei 
Kai na diabeis antipera na 3anabreis tous suntrofous sou 
An8h poulia elafia 
Na breis mian allh 8alassa mian allh apalosunh 
Na piaseis apo ta louria tou Axillea t' aloga 
Anti na ka8esai boubh ton potamo na malwneis 
Ton potamo na li8oboleis opws h mana tou Kitsou. 
Giati ki esu 8a 'xeis xa8ei ki h omorfia sou 8a 'xei gerasei. 
Mesa stous klwnous mias lugarias blepw to paidiko sou poukamiso na stegnwnei 
Par' to shmaia ths zwhs na sabanwseis to 8anato 
Ki as mh lugisei h kardia sou 
Ki as mhn kulhsei to dakru sou panw sthn aduswphth touth gh 
Opws ekulhse mia fora sthn pagwmenh erhmia to dakru tou pigkouinou 
Den wfelei to parapono 
Idia pantou 8a 'nai h zwh me to sourauli twn fidiwn sth xwra twn fantasmatwn 
Me to tragoudi twn lhstwn sta dash twn arwmatwn 
Me to maxairi enos kahmou sta magoula ths elpidas 
Me to marazi mias anoi3hs sta fullokardia tou gkiwnh 
Ftanei ena aletri na bre8ei ki ena drepani koftero s' ena xaroumeno xeri 
Ftanei n' an8isei mono 
Ligo stari gia tis giortes ligo krasi gia th 8umhsh ligo nero gia th skonh... 




Stou pikramenou thn aulh hlios den anatellei 
Mono skoulhkia bgainoune na koroideyoun t' astra 
Mono futrwnoun aloga stis murmhgkofwlies 
Kai nuxterides trwn poulia kai katourane sperma. 


Stou pikramenou thn aulh de basileuei h nuxta 
Mono 3ernan oi fullwsies ena potami dakrua 
Otan pernaei o diabolos na kabalhsei ta skulia 
Kai ta korakia kolumpan s' ena phgadi m' aima. 


Stou pikramenou thn aulh to mati exei stereyei 
Exei pagwsei to mualo ki exei h kardia petrwsei 
Kremontai sarkes batraxiwn sta dontia ths araxnhs 
Skouzoun akrides nhstikes se brukolakwn podia. 


Stou pikramenou thn aulh bgainei xortari mauro 
Mono ena bradu tou Magiou perase enas ageras 
Ena perpathma elafru sa skirthma tou kampou 
Ena fili ths 8alassas ths afrostolismenhs. 


Ki an 8a diyaseis gia nero 8a stiyoume ena sunnefo 
Ki an 8a peinaseis gia ywmi 8a sfa3oume ena ahdoni 
Mono karterei mia stigmh n' anoi3ei o pikraphganos 
N' astrayei o mauros ouranos na louloudisei o flomos. 


Ma eitan ageras ki efuge korudallos ki exa8h 
Eitan tou Mah to proswpo tou feggariou h asprada 
Ena perpathma elafru sa skirthma tou kampou 
Ena fili ths 8alassas ths afrostolismenhs. 




3upnhse gargaro nero apo th riza tou peukou na breis ta matia twn spourgitiwn kai na ta zwntaneyeis potizontas to xwma me murwdia basilikou kai me sfurigmata sauras. To 3erw eisai mia fleba gumnh katw apo to fobero blemma tou anemou eisai mia spi8a boubh mesa sto lampero plh8os twn astrwn. De se prosexei kaneis kaneis de stamata n' akousei thn anasa sou ma su me to baru sou perpathma mes sthn agerwxh fush 8a ftaseis mia mera sta fulla ths berukokias 8' anebeis sta lugera kormia twn mikrwn spartwn kai 8a kulhseis apo ta matia mias agaphtikias san efhbiko feggari. Yparxei mia petra a8anath pou kapote perastikos enas an8rwpinos aggelos egraye t' onoma tou epanw ths ki ena tragoudi pou den to 3erei akoma kaneis oute ta pio trela paidia oute ta pio sofa t' ahdonia. Einai kleismenh twra se mia sphlia tou bounou Ntebi mesa stis lagkadies kai sta faraggia ths patrikhs mou ghs ma otan anoi3ei kapote kai tinaxtei enantia sth f8ora kai sto xrono auto to aggeliko tragoudi 8a payei 3afnika h broxh kai 8a stegnwsoun oi laspes ta xionia 8a liwsoun sta bouna 8a kelahdhsei o anemos ta xelidonia 8' anasth8oun oi lugaries 8a righsoun ki oi an8rwpoi me ta krua matia kai ta xlwma proswpa otan akousoun tis kampanes na xtupan mesa sta ragismena kampanaria monaxes tous 8a broun kapela giortina na foresoun kai fiogkous fantaxterous na desoun sta papoutsia tous. Giati tote kaneis de 8' astieuetai pia to aima twn ruakiwn 8a 3exeilisei ta zwa 8a koyoun ta xalinaria tous sta paxnia to xorto 8a prasinisei stous stablous sta keramidia 8a petaxtoun oloxlwres paparounes kai mahdes kai s' ola ta staurodromia 8' anayoun kokkines fwties ta mesanuxta. Tote 8a 'r8oun siga-siga ta fobismena koritsia gia na peta3oun to teleutaio tous rouxo sth fwtia ki ologumna 8a xoreyoun trigurw ths opws thn epoxh akribws pou eimastan ki emeis neoi ki anoige ena para8uro thn augh gia na futrwsei sto sth8os tous ena flogato garufalo. Paidia isws h mnhmh twn progonwn na einai ba8uterh parhgoria kai pio polutimh suntrofia apo mia xoufta rodostamo kai to me8usi ths omorfias tipote diaforetiko apo thn koimismenh triantafullia tou Eurwta. Kalhnuxta loipon blepw swrous peftastera na sas liknizoun ta oneira ma egw kratw sta daxtula mou th mousikh gia mia kaluterh mera. Oi ta3idiwtes twn Indiwn 3eroune perissotera na sas poun ap' tous Buzantinous xronografous. 




O an8rwpos kata ton roun ths musthriwdous zwhs tou 
Katelipen eis tous apogonous tou deigmata pollapla kai anta3ia ths a8anatou katagwghs tou 
Opws epishs katelipen ixnh twn ereipiwn tou lukaugous xionostibadas ouraniwn erpetwn xartaetous adamantas kai blemmata uakin8wn 
En mesw anastenagmwn dakruwn peinhs oimwgwn kai tefras upogeiwn freatwn. 




Poso polu se agaphsa egw monaxa to 3erw 
Egw pou kapote s' aggi3a me ta matia ths poulias 
Kai me th xaith tou feggariou s' agkaliasa kai xoreyame mes stous kalokairiatikous kampous 
Panw sth 8erismenh kalamia kai fagame mazi to komeno trifulli 
Maurh megalh 8alassa me tosa botsala trigurw sto laimo tosa xrwmatista petradia sta mallia sou. 


Ena karabi mpainei sto gialo ena magganophgado skouriasmeno boggaei 
Mia toufa galanos kapnos mes sto triantafulli tou orizonta 
Idios me th fterouga tou geranou pou sparazei 
Straties xelidoniwn perimenoune na poun stous antreiwmenous to kalwsorises 
Mpratsa shkwnountai gumna me xaragmenes agkures sth masxalh

Melisses mpainobgainoune mes sta rou8ounia twn ageladwn 
Manthlia kalamatiana kumatizoune 
Kai mia kampana makrinh bafei ton ourano me loulaki 
San th fwnh kapoiou shmantrou pou ta3ideuei mesa st' asteria 
Tosous aiwnes feugato 
Apo twn Got8wn thn yuxh ki apo tous troullous ths Baltimorhs 
Ki ap' th xamenh Agia-Sofia to mega monasthri. 
Ma panw st' ayhla bouna poioi na 'nai autoi pou koitane 
Me thn akumanth matia kai to galhnio proswpo; 
Poias purkagias na 'nai antilalos autos o kourniaxtos ston agera; 
Mhna o Kalubas polemaei mhna o Lebentogiannhs;

Oud' o Kalubas polemaei ki oud' o Lebentogiannhs 
Oute ki amaxh epiasanen oi Germanoi me tous Maniates. 
Purgoi fulane siwphloi mia stoixeiwmenh prigkipissa

Tsopanareoi ataraxoi m' ena kalami flamourias lene to prwino tous tragoudi 
Enas anohtos kunhgos rixnei mia ntoufekia sta trugonia 
Ki enas palios anemomulos lhsmonhmenos ap' olous 
Me mia belona delfiniou rabei ta sapia tou pania monaxos tou 
Kai katebainei ap' tis plagies me ton karagialh prima 
Opws katebaine o Adwnis sta monopatia tou Xelmou na pei mia kalhspera ths Gkolfws.

Afou mataiws eperimena treis mhnes na me proskalesh kamia aeroporikh etaireia sto e3wteriko, anagkasthka na thlefwnhsw s’ enan gnwsto mou nautiko praktora, mhpws uparxei elpida na paw sto eswteriko, estw katastrwma, alla upo ton oron na exh kai faΐ.
     O filos mou –Petros elegeto–, an8rwpos drasthrios, ta katafere, ki ena meshmeri pou gurisa spiti me maurh kardia apo ta labara tou antikarkinikou agwnos, mou efere thn xarmosunon aggelia.
     ― En ta3ei, mou eipe. Sabbato apogeuma mexri Deutera prwi 8a kanhs krouaziera trellh. Suros, Thnos, Mukonos. Exeis 3anapaei;
     ― Oxi.
     ― Oriste 8aumasia eukairia na pas. Eisai euxaristhmenos;
     Den apanthsa amesws. Shmera h tetamenh katastasis epiballei sunesin kai oxi en8ousiasmous.
     ― Den mporw na sou pw twra amesws, Petro mou. Prepei na to skef8w kai na sta8misw ta pragmata. Kanei na sou apanthsw aurio;
     ― Pws den kanei, eipe o Petros. Ki efuge.
     Htan 8limmenh Paraskeuh otan mou to proteine. Perimena mexri 12 meshmeri tou Sabbatou mhpws exoume newtera apo kamia allh etaireia, perasa biastikos duo-treis fores e3w ap’ thn AIR FRANCE, anebhka LOYFT XANSA xwris apotelesma, eftasa mexri AI8IOPIAN AIPLAΪN kai TOYPK XABA GIOLAPH ki ekana pws koitaw tis bitrines kai stis 12 1/2, otan eida ki apoeida pws 8a katsw Sabbatokuriako sthn A8hna, phra ton Petro sto thlefwno:
     ― Akouse Petro, etaktopoihsa tas ergasias mou. Twra eimai eleu8eros kai mallon 8a el8w. Ti wra feugei to ploion, eipes;
     ― Stis 2 akribws. 1 1/2 na eisai sto roloi. 8a se perimenw.
     Sto roloi hmoun 1 para tetarto, ntumenos polu spor. Ephra kai oligous spor, ptuwn tas floud, kai xazeuwn ta bapor. Wraia bebaiws einai ta aeroplana, skef8hka, alla ti ta 8elete… Mono me to bapori ais8anesai asfaleia. Kai na boulia3h, pou leei o logos, me ligo kolumpi glutwneis. Pianesai apo kapou, bgaineis se kamia akth. Kamia fora swzontai monon duo, esu ki auth –wraiotath 3an8h me uperoxo swma–, kai glutwnete s’ ena erhmo nhsi me xourmadies, kokkofoinikes, plousia blasthsh ki e3wtika poulia, ki enw to uperoxo feggari 8’ anebainh ston ourano, auth 8a sou tragoudah nostalgika tragoudia ths patridos ths kai 8a se nanourizh xaideuontas sou ta mallia. O monos fobos s’ autes tis periptwseis einai mhn emfanis8oun tipotis agrioi kannibaloi me dhlhthriwdh belh. M’ auto 8elw na pw pws kai ta 8alassia ta3idia den einai ki auta asfalh 100%, alla nomizw pws kata kapoio tropo einai asfalestera apo to aeroplano. Epeita, mhpws ola ta nhsia exoun kannibalous; Mporei na sou tuxh kai nhsi teleiws akatoikhto. Auta einai zhthmata ka8arws tuxhs. Alla kai na emfanis8oun, 3erw na uperaspisw ton eauto mou kai ekeinhn. 8a polemhsw agria kai apofasistika ws Ellhn maxhths, skorpizwn ton 8anaton stous i8ageneis. 3eurw pws o agwn 8a einai anisos kai isws sullhf8w kai aixmalwtos kai 8a kaih o hlios otan 8a me metaferoun oi agrioi me alalagmous sthn kaluba tou arxhgou. 3erw apo twra malista ti 8a me rwthsh:
     ― Pote hr8es edw;
     ― Den 8a dwsw logariasmo se kanenan, 8a apanthsw.
     ― Kai giati ka8esai ston hlio;
     ― Etsi 8elw…
     ― 8eleis kamia lemonada; moupe o Petros. Se blepw asxhma.
     Oi mauroi e3hfanis8hsan ws dia mageias. O leukos Petros eurisketo mprosta mou.
     ― Den exw tipota. Pame. Arghses, mwre Petro…
     Mpros o Petros pisw egw o mauros, mphkame ston «Karaiskakh».
     ― Ela, mou eipe, na paroume kati sto mpar na sunel8hs. Ti 8a parhs;
     ― Ti exei;
     ― Ap’ ola uparxoun ston «Karaiskakh».
     ― Ε, tote as paroume ena Karaouiskakh, alla xwris soda.
     Katebaza se mikres goulies ton endo3o oplarxhgo, koitazontas gurw mou.
     ― Poios einai autos, Petro; rwthsa, deixnontas mia fwtografia megalh.
     ― O idiokthths tou ploiou Nomikos.

Mazeu8hkan oi Ale3andrinoi
na doun ths Kleopatras ta paidia,
ton Kaisariwna, kai ta mikra tou aderfia,
Ale3andro kai Ptolemaio, pou prwth
fora ta bgazan e3w sto Gumnasio,
ekei na ta khru3oun basileis,
mes sth lamprh parata3i twn stratiwtwn.

O Ale3andros— ton eipan basilea
ths Armenias, ths Mhdias, kai twn Par8wn.
O Ptolemaios— ton eipan basilea
ths Kilikias, ths Surias, kai ths Foinikhs.
O Kaisariwn stekontan pio emprosta,
ntumenos se meta3i triantafulli,
sto sth8os tou an8odesmh apo uakin8ous,
h zwnh tou diplh seira sapfeirwn ki ame8ustwn,
demena ta podhmata tou m’ aspres
kordelles kenthmenes me rodoxroa margaritaria.
Auton ton eipan piotero apo tous mikrous,
auton ton eipan Basilea twn Basilewn.

Oi Ale3andrinoi enoiw8an bebaia
pou hsan logia auta kai 8eatrika.

Alla h mera htane zesth kai poihtikh,
o ouranos ena galazio anoixto,
to Ale3andrino Gumnasion ena
8riambiko kator8wma ths texnhs,
twn aulikwn h poluteleia ektakth,
o Kaisariwn olo xaris ki emorfia
(ths Kleopatras uios, aima twn Lagidwn)·
k’ oi Ale3andrinoi etrexan pia sthn eorth,
k’ en8ousiazontan, k’ epeufhmousan
ellhnika, k’ aiguptiaka, kai poioi ebraiika,
gohteumenoi me t’ wraio 8eama—
m’ olo pou bebaia h3euran ti a3izan auta,
ti koufia logia hsane autes h basileies. 

Εpituxeis kai plhrws ikanopoihmenoi,
o basileus Ale3andros Iannaios,
k’ h suzugos tou h basilissa Ale3andra
pernoun me proporeuomenhn mousikhn
kai me pantoian megaloprepeian kai xlidhn,
pernoun ap’ tes odous ths Ierousalhm.
Εtelesforhse lamprws to ergon
pou arxisan o megas Ioudas Makkabaios
k’ oi tessares periwnumoi adelfoi tou·
kai pou meta anendotws sunexis8h en mesw
pollwn kindunwn kai pollwn dusxereiwn.
Twra den emeine tipote to anoikeion.
Epause ka8e upotagh stous alazonas
monarxas ths Antioxeias. Idou
o basileus Ale3andros Iannaios,
k’ h suzugos tou h basilissa Ale3andra
ka8’ ola isoi pros tous Seleukidas.
Ioudaioi kaloi, Ioudaioi agnoi, Ioudaioi pistoi —pro pantwn.
Alla, ka8ws pou to apaitoun h peristaseis,
kai ths ellhnikhs lalias eidhmones·
kai m’  Ellhnas kai m’ ellhnizontas
monarxas sxetismenoi— plhn san isoi, kai n’ akouetai.
Twonti etelesforhse lamprws,
etelesforhse perifanws
to ergon pou arxisan o megas Ioudas Makkabaios
k’ oi tessares periwnumoi adelfoi tou. 

Εis to xrusoboullon pou ebgal’ o Ale3ios Komnhnos
gia na timhsei thn mhtera tou epifanws,
thn lian nohmona Kurian Anna Dalasshnh —
thn a3iologh sta erga ths, sta h8h —
uparxoun diafora egkwmiastika:
edw as metaferoume apo auta
mia frasin emorfhn, eugenikh
«Ou to emon h to son, to yuxron touto rhma, errh8h». 

Ston prologo ths Ale3iados ths 8rhnei,
gia thn xhreia ths h Anna Komnhnh.

Εis iliggon ein’ h yuxh ths. «Kai
rei8rois dakruwn», mas legei, «periteggw
tous of8almous..... Feu twn kumatwn» ths zwhs ths,
«feu twn epanastasewn». Thn kaiei h odunh 
«mexris ostewn kai muelwn kai merismou yuxhs».

Omws h alh8eia moiazei pou mia luph monhn
kairian egnwrisen h filarxh gunaika·
enan kaumo ba8u monaxa eixe
(ki as mhn t’ omologei) h agerwxh auth Graikia,
pou den katafere, m’ olhn thn de3iothta ths,

Ε3eutelis8h plhrws.         Mia erwtikh roph tou
lian apagoreumenh         kai perifronhmenh
(emfuth molontouto)         uphr3en h aitia:
htan h koinwnia         semnotufh polu.

katopi th seira,        kai thn upolhyi tou.

na bgalei se douleia,         toulaxiston gnwsth.
Εniote ta e3oda tou         ta kerdizen apo

A3izei parapanw         ths emorfias tou h mnhmh.

ths ka8arhs sarkos tou         thn ka8arh hdonh.

Ap’ thn upolhyi tou;         Ma h koinwnia pou htan
semnotufh polu         susxetize kouta. 

Touto eis auton uphrxe to 3exwristo,
pou mesa s’ olhn tou thn eklusi
kai thn pollhn tou peiran erwtos,

ta poihtika ta matia, to xlwmo

Xarismeno tou Giwrgou Katsimpalh


Den eitan h omorfoterh, ma eitan h pio tsakpina
    	k' eixe diko ths xou.
Gia dauth, legan, toustriyan, edw kai kana mhna,
    	tou Mpamph tou Lexou.

Gia dauth mparkaristhke kai tou Lakia t' agori,
    	pou to katapie h gh.
8a peis, autos den tw3ere to soi tou; gia thn korh
    	pws phe tou Mpenagh;

Pou auth, thn proskunhsane kefalia ki afentades,
    	afou ths phe gampros
ki o Mpikas ap' ta Salwna, pwxei ta spitia arades
    	stou Pepa, ligo mpros.

Ki o Nakos o kapnemporas, o gios tou Karantoula,
    	pwxei flouri m' oura,
ki apo kalos, de legetai· lebenths me ta oula.
    	Kai 8aeitan mia kura.

Ki akoma thn pro3eneye-katakala to 3airw,
    	ma logos na mh bgei-
o tokisths o Topakas, alla ton eipan gero.
    	(Mas twlee h Xrusaugh.) 

Ma o Mpenaghs ton boleye, kai paei ki autos, me tropo,
    	ki as eixe t' aga8a,
kata pws mpaizogelage ka8e gampro ap' ton topo,
    	me t' aurio, me to 8a

Tetoia eitan h Aggelika, k' eitan monaxokorh
    	ki ws dekaefta xronw.
Ta eikosipente pathsa pou leipw ap' to Braxwri,
    	ma den th lhsmonw.

Giati me tous anupantrous, pouxan kairo gia gamo,
    	eitan k' oi pio mikroi.
T' amoustaka kai t' agoura, pou agapes 3eran, ammo,
    	ki apo kenteri, gri.

Mia kai den to 3eshkwnan oi topoi mas aberta
    	o3w na bgainei h nia,
dos tou ki apo thn porta ths mprosta ta sourta-ferta·
    	sto podi h geitonia.

Kai gia na mhn tous pairnoune kai murwdia oi geitonoi,
    	pou olo katalaloun,
oi mualwmenoi fulagan to ntoro, sa nuxtwnei,
    	na mhn ton ntilaloun.

Ka8enas paei gia logou tou, ki wstoso pan antama.
    	K' oi agaphtikoi
suntrofika apofasizan gia na thn kleyoun, ama
    	th briskan bolikh.

Ma, san th blepan, legane, ta spitia kai gurizan,
    	ki an rixnan mia matia,
mataki den apomene, ka8ws thn antikruzan,
    	xwris stalamatia.

Monaxa to tragoudi tous pws tairiaze olonwne
    	na skaei to mustiko:
-Xhra 8a geneis, 3ere to· ta nuxia mh se trwne
    	gi' arrebwniastiko.

Ki o diplanos t' aposwne: -Xare, ta roda koye
    	kai t' an8ia tou ntounia,
kai fer' ta mou kai strws' ta mou, sa 8a pe8anw apoye
    	s' authn th geitonia.

Kai to tragoudi gurize, barkoula apo th mpanta,
    	ston asiklh amane.
K' h karotsada kapote me ta biolia. Kai panta
    	sta panta refene.

Ki an h8ele thn petuxan sthn porta ths mian wra
    	-pou taxei as ta traba-
h kalamata anasurth kai to roloi sta fora,
    	ki o koukos tous straba.

Mono mhn elees agarmph, pou na peirazei, le3h
    	kai pare3hgh8ei,
giati, gia ena filotimo kanenas otan mple3ei,
    	mporei na skotw8ei.

Ki autoi to paineuontane pws eitan sto ntahliki
    	me kotsi kai kardia.
To grafan kai sto lazo tous me t' ashmi maniki
    	giomata kai fardia:

"Ths fulakhs ta sidera einai gia tous lebentes.
    	Ax! bax! kakourga gh."
K' h Aggelika trabiotane, na mhn akouei koubentes
    	kai t' onoma ths bgei.

Apotrabiotan k' epairne mazi ths ton aera
    	kai thn epi8umia,
ki apomene t' apofwno san apo mia flogera
    	s' aperanth erhmia.

Ki apomenan t' afterouga, sto dromo petaroudia,
    	kai mes ston korniaxto.
Sa na yuxorraghsane kobontan ta tragoudia
    	sto stoma t' anoixto.

Palia uphrxan tria merh ston kosmo· h Kuyelh, h Ellada kai o planhths Gh. Twra bgainoun kai lene oti o kosmos einai enas, omws lene yemata ki auto fainetai sta matia tous. to strwnei arga sto patwma kai sto trapezi
kai stis palies fwtografies,
gnwrima matia twn nekrwn, 
pou ton koitazoun ap’ to mellon.
Εkeinh tria xronia pe8amenh
kai mono to diko ths blemma
erxetai apo ta perasmena.

kai ka8arizei t’ oplo tou ap’ to prwi.

ma na trupwsei den mporei sth mona3ia tou.
Mia mona3ia pou xtisthke siga siga
m’ ola ta ulika kai dixws logia.
 
Konteuoune 3hmerwmata ki akomh

alla to xadi xanetai.

ki h murwdia ap’ to baru kapno tou.

makrukano palio mprostogemes
gemato skagia kai mparouti mauro.
Otan apofasisei na tou ri3ei
de 8a prolabei pali na ton dei
pisw ap’ to sunnefo ths ntoufekias tou.
 
Αn skeftetai st’ alh8eia kati tetoia,
kai den ton timwrw egw m’ autes tis skeyeis,
pws na plagiasei kai na koimh8ei.

enas pateras pou tou etuxe
siwphlo kai dustropo paidi,
kai na tou pw mia istoria
gia na ton parei o upnos.
 
Ypne pou pairneis ta paidia pare kai ton patera...
 
Ypne pou pairneis ta paidia
pare kai ton patera· ap’ tis masxales pias’ tone
sa na ’tan labwmenos. Opou phgaineis ta paidia
ekei perpathse ton, me to baru ampexwno
                         stis plates tou n’ axnizei.
 
Dws’ tou ki ena kalo skuli
kai tous palious tou filous, kai ri3e xioni ustera

apo to para8uri, thn egnoia ths na blepoume
sta galana ths matia, ki oloi na ths to kruboume
                          pws einai pe8amenh.
 
Ypne pou pairneis ta paidia

paidakia twn paidiwn mas. Se strwmatsada ri3e mas

na blasthmoun to xioni. Ki emeis na tous lupomaste
pou ginane megaloi kai na biazomaste polu
na moiasoume s’ ekeinous, na doun pws megalwsame
                          na parhgorh8oune.

Anamesa sto par8enagwgeio kai thn ek8esh, s' ena dromaki polu steno, monopati mallon, xronia briskontan parapetamenh -kata thn prosfilh sunh8eia twn arxaiologwn mas- mia 8aumasia arxaia sarkofagos. Eixe ba8ia skalismenes tis pleures me erwtes, klhmata kai louloudenies girlantes, enw panw sto kalumma ths xamogelouse misoplagiasmeno apala ena agalmatenio zeugari rwmaikhs epoxhs. Anashkwmenoi sto anaklintro, ere8istika gumnoi katw ap' to sentoni, h gunaika empros kai o antras piswkollhta katopi, sunexizan 8arreis tous 8aumasious erwtes tous. Mou arese na tous koitw, gi' auto, tis nuxtes idiws, pernousa suxna apo kei. Me anapauoun, allwste, oloi oi erhmoi kai skoteinoi dromoi. Mono ka8ws badizeis s' autous, mporei kati to elpidoforo na probalei entos sou kai kapws na hmereyei h yuxh. Phgaina kai ka8omoun sto xeilos ths misoskepasmenhs larnakas, sa na perimena n' anasth8ei to antroguno h na er8oun oi glukies murofores gia na tis anaggeilw egw prwtos thn anastash: hger8hsan, ouk eisin wde· ide o topos opou e8hkan autous. Sunh8ws omws 3eprobale anamesa st' agrioxorta kai sta yhla sinapia kapoios pou erxontan gia anagkh tou h kanenas tupos upoptos, monos tou h me parea. Opote, anti na anaggeilw thn anastash, diplwna ta ftera mou ki efeuga mazemenos, perissotero gia logous pronoias para apo diakritikothta. Ki omws, h sarkofagos ekeinh htan oloklhrh h latreuth eidwlolatreia gia mena.
    Se ligo, me xara diepistwsa pws thn eixe kanei fwlia tou ena zeugari nearwn erastwn. Mpainan mesa ap' to lo3a trabhgmeno kapaki kai 3aplwnan panw se strwmenes efhmerides, kollhmenoi, bebaia, sfixta sfixta. Isws na bgazan kai ta rouxa tous to kalokairi. Kati mou fanhke kapoia bradia pws uphrxe afhmeno sto xeilos. Pantws, akoma kai na 'brexe, profulagontan ap' to skepasma arketa. Ma kai h sarkofagos fulagontan ap' autous, efoson ekeines toulaxisto tis wres kanenas den plhsiaze na th brwmisei. Oi nearoi, molis akougan ta bhmata mou, stamatousan tous yi8urismous. Ki egw pernousa grhgora kai krufogelasta, mia kai misw ta krufakousmata oso tipote allo ston kosmo. Den pareleipa omws na xaideyw ligo ponhra sto plai thn tuxerh sarkofago.
    To zeugaraki, sigoura, den mporouse oute na upoyiastei se ti eixe xrhsimeusei allote ekeinh h larnaka. Oute apo makria de 8a mporouse na fantastei ta ptwmata ta toumpaniasmena, th brwma kai th sapila, pou thn eixan kapote diapotisei. Polu perissotero de 8a '3ere pws htan kamwmenh apo petra eidikh, pou exei thn idiothta na katatrwgei pio grhgora tis an8rwpines sarkes. Enas 8eos monaxa 3erei, ti 8a nomizan pws htan ekeino to koubouklio.
    Yphr3e omws kati, pou opwsdhpote 8a 'prepe na tous enoxlei. Ki auto htan h stenothta tou xwrou. Thn eixa diapistwsei ki o idios mpainontas kapote mesa. Tote, giati h epimonh tous auth; Poios tous empodize h tous kunhgouse; Sta zeugarakia, opws einai gnwsto, kanei plates olakerh h koinwnia xamogelwntas ponhra sto perasma tous. Na 'tan kamia allh periptwsh, apo keines tis katakritees, na to katalabw. Alla edw htan adunato logika na brw akrh. 8a 'prepe, pantws, na tous arese polu ekei mesa.
    Ap' auta ki ap' auta arxise to e3hs na me basanizei: pws 8a mporouse na kulhsei to ashkwto ekeino skepasma panw sth larnaka; Asfalws, me moxlous h me takakia, katelh3a. Epomenws, to kapaki 8a mporouse na pagideutei kai na kulhsei akribws thn wra pou 8a 'mpaine mesa to zeugari. 8a 'rxizan, fusika, na fwnazoun, na xtupoun kai na xtupiountai, ma telika kapoioi asfalws 8a tous akougan kai 8a 'fernan ena gerano na tous 3eskepasei. 8a dhmiourgountan etsi mia e3airetika prwtotuph kai e3upnh -na parei o diabolos- upo8esh kai polloi 8a 'spazan adika twn adikwn to kefali tous na broune th lush. Monaxa autoi pou 8a '3eran ap' th mu8ologia ekeino to pagideuma tou Arh kai ths Afrodiths ap' ton Hfaisto, kati 8a upopteuontan. Mporei, bebaia, na mhn tous akouge kai kanenas, opote egw pou ekei konta 8a parafulaga, 8a thlefwnousa stous armodious na er8oun na tous bgaloun. De 8a tous afhna na pa8oun tipote, aplws 8a tous boh8ousa na zhsoun entona kati. H8ela e3allou na 3anazwntaneyw th larnaka. Na 'nai pali kleisth kai pali me gumna neanika swmata mesa, pou 8a petiountan omws me laxtara se ligo sa nekranasthmena. Sarkofagos na 3anaginei ep' oudeni logw 8a ths epetrepa.
    Apanw pou 3anameletousa thn enath raywdia ths Odusseias ki elega pia me agalliash na balw to sxedio mou se efarmogh, arxisan ta egklhmata tou drakou. Kai molonoti den pisteya ola ekeina ta paramu8ia, apo peira pikrh anesteila amesws tis peripolies mou sta erhma kai sta skoteina. To idio, allwste, 8a 'kane kai to zeugaraki.
    Se ligo, phra twn ommatiwn mou kai 3anafuga ap' thn polh auth, opou anabluzei, gia mena toulaxisto, san to muro h agwnia. Otan meta apo xronia 3anaperasa, o topos htan agnwristos gurw ap' to par8enagwgeio. Gkremisthkan ta panta ki aplw8hke ki ekei h legomenh die8nhs ek8esh. Einai, malista, ka8ws upologizw, ena apo ta pio fwtismena shmeia ths to stenaki ekeino. Oso gia th sarkofago thn 3anabrhka proxtes, oxi xwris sugkinhsh, ston khpo tou mouseiou. Mou fanhke 8liberh, sa na 3anagine tafos.

Den 3erw pia ti ginetai me thn omixlh ki an e3akolou8ei na peftei toso phxth h mhpws xa8hke olotela ki auth, opws h paxnh panw ap' ta prwina keramidia. Blepontas thn par8enikh paxnh na gualizei pantou, legame: "Eixe kruo th nuxta" h "ta laxana 8a ginoun me thn paxnh pio gluka· prepei na kanoume ntolmades".
Otan erxotan o kairos ths omixlhs, eixa panta to nou mou s' authn. Mera th mera perimena na me skepasei ki egw na xwnomai a8eatos mesa ths. 8libomoun omws polu, otan epefte tis ka8hmerines, thn wra pou basanizomoun me ta xartia sto grafeio. Parakalousa na krathsei ws to bradu, sunh8ws omws gurw sto meshmeri dialuotan apo enan hlio idiaitera dusaresto.
Ma, kamia fora, otan 3upnwntas t' apogeuma, thn wra pou elega an 8a paw sto sinema h sto kafeneio, eblepa anapantexa ap' to para8uro to aperanto 8eama ths omixlhs, allaza amesws sxedia kai poreies. Shkwna to giaka ths kamparntinas, katebaina me sigouria ta skalia ki efeuga gia thn paralia, xwris talanteuseis. H omixlh einai gia na badizeis mesa s' authn. Diasxizeis kati pou einai puknotero apo aeras kai se sthrizei. Alla kai kati akoma· omixlh xwris limani einai pragma atairiasto. 
H omixlh htan akoma pio glukia, otan thn yilokentouse ekeinh h broxh, h polu yilh broxh tou ouranou mas. Auth pou de se brexei, ma se potizei monaxa kai futrwnoun pio lampera ta mallia sou thn allh bdomada. Kai tote epairnan nohma ta fwta kai ta tram kai ta kornarismata. Akoma ki oi polukatoikies ginontan elkustikes mes sthn axnada.
Ki ustera eftana sto kafeneio tou limaniou, auto pou apo xronia einai gkremismeno, na 3anabrw thn parea mou. Ki otan den htan ekei -kai den htan pote ekei- ka8omoun wres kai karterousa. Pisw ap' ta tzamia diabainan arada oi skies autwn, pou twra exoun pe8anei. Kollousan to moutro tous gia mia stigmh sto 8ampo tzami ki alloi empainan mesa, enw alloi trabousan anatolika gia ton Purgo tou Aimatos. Ki an de mou egnefe kaneis, ebgaina ki akolou8ousa mia skia, pou pote den mporousa na proftasw.
De 8umamai apo pou erxotan ekeinh h omixlh· mallon katebaine apo yhla. Twra, pantws, 3ekinaei ba8ia ap' ta oneira. Auta pou xronia menane skepasmena m' ena baru kapaki, pou omws phre ap' thn piesh gia kala na paramerizei.
Peftei pollh omixlh, ginomai ena m' authn, kai 3ekinaw. Akolou8w alles skies onomatizontas tes. Perpatw koitazontas to li8ostrwto. Auto se pollous dromous kai dromakia akoma diathreitai. Den uparxei, bebaia, anamesa stis petres to xortaraki, pou futrwne tote. Ola exoun gkremisei h 3era8ei. Kanenas 8anatos den einai kalos. W, kai na 'tan alh8eia, auto pou lene, pws 8a tous 3anabroume olous…
Akolou8wntas tis skies mpainw panta ston idio dromo. Ta dentra kai ta futa 8erieuoun mes sth mona3ia kai th 8oloura. Ginontai san kastra terastia. Ftanw sto agerwxo spiti to tuligmeno me kissous kai fullwmata. Feugw kai 3anaxanomai mesa sta tram, ta fwta kai thn kinhsh. O nous mou einai kollhmenos sthn omixlh kai s' ola osa eida mesa s' authn. Prospa8wntas na 3exastw perpatw polu tis omixliasmenes nuxtes. Ais8anomai kapoia anakoufish me to badisma. Ta megala basana katastalazoune siga siga sto kormi kai dioxeteuontai ap' ta podia sto ugro xwma.


Zhtw tous mustikous Xristous
sta templa kai tous nar8hkes.

diyw gia th storgh tou ka8e bradu.

ki ape se 3anagorasa akriba sth Bhrutto.

Me porfuro sta xeilh mou koxuli se prostazw.
Sto xeri to geraki sou kai ta skulia luta.
Apanw8e mou skoupise th 8alassa pou stazw
kai ma8e me na perpatw panw sth gh swsta.

Nautaki tou glukou nerou.
Se pianei ―mhn to peis allou― sa gata h lamarina
kai se sastizei 3afniko probetzo tou kairou.

To ntuma pare tou fidiou kai dws' mou ena mantili.
Egw, ―kai s' egdusa mprosta sto gero Tisiano.

Se lofo giapwneziko koimatai to sterno.

ki ena koralli 3e8wro mazi.

ebenos, ―glwssa ths fwtias, sto ba8os kremezi.

Fwta tou Melbourne. Bareta kulaei o Yara Yara
anamesa se forthga pelwria kai bouba,
fernontas pros to pelagos, xwris na dinei diara,
tou koritsiou to filhma, pou stoixise akriba.

Gera thn anemoskala. Kafe gia ton piloto.
Lakizete, alusodetoi tou sterianou kahmou.
Kai sena, pou se kerdisa mianhs nuxtias se loto,
smigeis kai pas me ton kapno tou gkrizou potamou.

Mia barka 8elw, potame, na ri3w apo xartoni,
opws autes pou paizoune stis ox8es ma8htes.
Skotwnei, pes mou, o xwrismos; ―Matwnei, de skotwnei.
Poios eipe founto; yemmata. De ftasame potes.

3exasa keino to mikro koritsi apo to Amoi
kai th moulatra pou ezexne krasi sthn Tenerifa,
ton erwta, pou apotimaei se 3ulino xamwi,
kai th gria pou emetrage me pontous thn tarifa.

To bussini tou Tisianou kai tou permagganatou,
kai ta krebatia 3exasa ta sarabaliasmena
me ta lera sentonia tous ta polukairismena,
gia to kormi sou, pou ediwxne to fobo tou 8anatou.

O,ti agapousa arnh8hka gia to pikro sou axeili:
ton tromo pou dokimaza phdwntas to katarti,
to mpousoula, th bardia mou kai thn poreia sto xarth,
gia ena duseureto mikro 8alassino koxuli.

Ton pureto stous Tropikous, tou Rio th malafrantza,
thn purkagia pou anayame mia nuxta sto Manao.
Th maxairia pou mou 'dwse o Magiaros sthn Kwstantza
kai «Se ponaei me th notia;» ―Oxi, ap' allou ponaw.

Tou tratologou ton kahmo, tou nauth thn orfania,
tou karabiou pou ka8ise thn plwrh th spasmenh.
Tis 3ebammenes stampes mou, pou 'xa gia perhfania,
gia sena, pou salparises, goleta armatwmenh.

Ti na sou ta3w, ati8asso paidi, na se krathsw;
Parhgoria mou o sakos mou, s' Amerikh kai Asia.
Surma pou ekophke sta duo kai pws na to matisw;
Katakahmene, h 8alassa misaei thn prodosia.

Katebhke o Poluguros kai ginhke limani.
Limani kataskoteino, steno, xwris fanaria,
apoye pou agkaliasthkan Ebraioi kai Mousoulmanoi
kai ta3ideyan ta nhsia ston ponto, ta Kanaria.

Gero, sou prepei monaxa to sidero sta podia,
duo metra karabopano, kai aristero timoni.
Mia medousa se antikrise galazia kai simwnei
ki enas bu8os pou boskoune salaxia kai xtapodia.

Oi nautikoi sta forthga panta mia gata trefoun,
pou th latreuoune, xwris na 3eroun to giati,
ki auth, san ap' th bardia tous sxolane kourasmenoi,
perhfanh sta podia tous 8a tre3ei na triftei.

Ta bradia, otan h 8alassa xtupaei tis lamarines,
kai polemaei me dunamh na spasei ta karfia,
mesa sths plwrhs th baria sigh, pou basanizei,
einai gi' autous sa mia glukia gunaikeia suntrofia.

Einai perhfanh ki oknh, ka8ws oles oi gates, 
ki einai ta gkriza matia ths giomata hlektrismo·
ki opws xaideuoun apala th raxh ths, nomizeis
pws analuetai s' ena argo kai hdoniko spasmo.

Sto rembasmo kai sto 8umo me th gunaika moiazei
ki oi nautes perissotero thn agapoun gi' auto·
ki otan arga kai ra8uma sta matia tous koitazei,
8arreis enan para3eno pws fernei pureto.

Ths exoun panta sto laimo mia mpakirenia gura,
gia tou siderou thn kakhn arrwstia fulaxto,
xwris omws, alimono, pote na kator8wnoun
na thn fula3oun ap' to mauro 8anato m' auto.

Giati einai t' agria matia ths ugra ki hlektrismena
ki etsi a8ela to sidero to mauro to traba,
ki ourliazontas trelainetai s' ena shmeio koitwntas
fernontas dakrua skoteina stous nautes kai bouba.


Ligo prin ap' to 8anaton apo tous nautes enas,
―autos opou 'de pramata sth zhsh tou frixta―
xaideuontas thn, mia stigmh sta matia thn koitazei
ki ustera mes' sth 8alassa thn agria thn peta.

Kai tote oi nautes, pou polu spania luga h kardia tous,
pane sthn plwrh na kruftoun me thn kardia sfixth,
gemath mia para3enh pikria pou olo dagkwnei,
san otan xanoume 8ermh gunaika agaphth.

Thn ane3hghth grafh na lusw polemw
pou sou xara3an peirates Kinezoi stis lagones.
Gumnoi me 3ulinous fallous trigurw ap' to laimo,
mas sprwxnan pros th 8alassa me to3a oi Patagones.

Kokkalo ri3e sto skuli to mauro pou aluxta
kai steile th «figoura» mas ston peirath regalo.
Pes mou, pou bre8hke h steria stou pelaou t' anoixta
kai to dentri me to pouli pou krwzei to megalo;

Gia to astro ths Anatolhs kinhsame mikroi.
Pouli, poulaki steriano, 8alassa de sou prepei!
Kai se pou se futeyame, paidi, sto Konakri,
me gramma sumbouleutiko ths manas sou sthn tseph.

Tou nauth dws' tou sth steria krebati, kai na piei.
―Olo ton kosmo gurises, ma tipota den eides...―
Mes' sto meta3i krubontan ths Intias oi skorpioi
ki eferne o ageras ths notias sthn plwrh ammo ki akrides.

Shmadi mauro apomeine ki as espase o xalkas.
―Sthn agora tou Alitzeriou demenh na se surw.―
Kai phdh3e o mikros 8eos mia nuxta, twn Inkas,
stou Aigaiou ta galana nera, duo milia o3w ap' th Skuro.

Mesanuxta kai ta3ideueis dixws pleurika!
Skiazesai mhpws sto gialo ta fwta se prodinoun,
ma pruma plwra mono esu patas stoxastika,
kratwntas sta xerakia sou to luxno tou Aladinou.
Na zeis sthn idia politeia pantotina
kai na 'xeis twn anaxwrhsewn th mania,
ma feugontas ap' to grafeio ta bradina
na kaneis of8almoporneia sta kafeneia.

ma o kosmos egine san adeianh fullada,
einai to idio pia na meneis sthn Ellada
me to na ta3ideueis sto Fernando Po.

Ta forthga einai kakota3ida ki argoun,
mes' sta postalia plhtteis, blepontas touristes·
to na fortwneis mhnes ruzia sto Pagkoun
ein' prama pou skotwnei tous artistes.

Oi poloi ginane se mas polu gnwstoi,
8aumasame polles fores to boreio Selas,
ki exoun oi pagoi xronia twra skepastei 
apo adeiana koutia spaniolikhs sardelas.

Sthn Taith ezhse mhnes ki o Loti·
an pas ligaki parakatou, stis Markizes,
pou allotes trwgane mpananes ki agries rizes,
kalluntika twra poulane tou Coty.

Oi Giapwnezes, ta koritsia sth Xilh
ki oi maures tou Marokou pou poulane meli,
exoun san oles tis gunaikes ta idia skelh
kai dinoun me ton idio tropo to fili.

H autoktonia, pronomio pia sta 8hluka―
kapotes kaname ki emeis auth th skeyh.
Pe8aineis pio siga me ta narkwtika,
ma teleutaia ta 'xoun ki auta polu no8eyei.

Trantaze san apo seismo su8emela o Xortiaths
ki' akontize mhnumata me kokkinh bafh.
Grafh apo treis kai mougines motari kai karfi.
Me erixne h Toumpa, se diplo krebati, ta xartia ths.

Th makina gia ton kapno kai to tsigaroxarti
thn exases, thn 3exases, th xarises allou.
Htane tote pou espase to mesiano katarti.
Ta yemata tou bouthxth, tou nauth, tou lwlou.

Kai ti den exw uposxe8ei kai ti den exw ta3ei,
ma ta saranta kumata mou ftaine kai 3exnw
―ths Agras ta makria saria, tou Santoun to meta3i―
kai ta 8umamai molis dw ana8rwskonta kapno.

To daxtulidi pouferna mou tokleye h Oragia.
Ton papagalo ― madhse ki' epaye na milei.
As ekatebaine estw mia, sto bira, sta mouragia,
ki' as koitaze thn agkura monaxa, pou kalei.

Tipota sta xerakia mou, mana mou, de ftouraei, ―
erwtas, malamatika, 3omplia kai fulaxta.
Sixainomai to nautiko pou emazeye lefta.
Emoutzwse th 8alassa kai thne katouraei.

Ths Salonikhs monaxa ths prepei to karabi.
Na mhn tolmhseis na th deis pote apo th steria.
Ki' an kapoia sthn Kalamaria poukamiso mou rabei,
mporei na r8w ap' ta pelaga me th furoneria.

     – Ma! Ore manna!

Ti 8a exane taxa mesa sth mona3ia ekeinh, an katwr8wne na summazw3h olo to esw8ema enos Karagkounh;
      Alla ta spitia ola hsan kala mantalwmena. O Tziritokwstas, apogohteumenos, eskef8hke na gurish pali ston axurwna tou, otan akouse pisw apo to konaki paidiwn fwnes kai gunaikeia xaskogelasmata.

     Ekeinh thn wra efanhken empros tous o Tziritokwstas, xwmenos olokormos mesa sta kourelia tou, mikros kai tapeinos kai toson elaxistos, pou eleges apo thn kakopa8eia molis ekratiotan sta podia tou.      – T’ eipes; e3efwnhse katakokkinh apo xara kai ntroph h Kroustallw. T’ exeis eipes;

     Oi gunaikes, ka8ws akousan ta logia tou, afhsan h mia me thn allh to 3efullisma tou arapositou kai ton etrigurisan prosexontas kai sto elaxisto kinhma tou.      O Tziritokwstas egnwrize polu kala th magikh epirroh pou exoun stis gunaikes ta musthria kai ta sumbola. Apo makrinh parathrhsh egnwrize pws o kosmos autos, pou anw8en estal8hkan oi zhtianoi na ekmetalleuwntai me thn ponhria tous, exei diafores adunamies kai murioproswpes anagkes. Eprepe loipon ka8e zhtianos na pairnh ta metra tou, gia na kolakeyh tis adunamies autes, na sumplhrwsh tis anagkes, an h8ele na kerdish xrhmata. Eprepe na meleta prwt’ apo yhla to aperanto basileio tou ki epeita na katebainh s’ auto kai n’ arxizh to stadio tou panoplos kai apolemhtos. Gia touto o Tziritokwstas den eperiorizotan monon sths zhtianias ta kamwmata. Gia ka8e an8rwpon eixe kai 3exwristhn me8odon energeias. Sumbolo tou eixe pantote to nautiko rhto: «ka8e makaras kai to 3ulofulli tou». Ixnhlatousen, e3etaze ki euriske telos thn adunamia tou ka8enos. Opou ekatalabaine pws den wfeloun oi xristianikes euxes, ebane s’ energeia diabolika paraggelmata. Opou den hmporouse n’ aplwsh xeri, akonize th glwssa tou. Otan den euriske tous elehmones, ezhtouse tous deisidaimones, tous mwrous.      – Pou eine to; na to idw· erwthsen anupomonh.

     All’ o Tziritokwstas, argomaswntas, ths antilege. Auto eine kata tis kardies. Eine polloi pou exoun tou kosmou t’ aga8a· omws den dinoun oute tou aggelou tous nero! "W ton Pafnoutio!"

1
Toutos ein' ekeinos o an8rwpos, opou ezhtouse thn elehmosunh, ki opou tosa efwnaze gia th filarguria twn an8rwpwn. Ein' o idios, opou otan h tuxh argotera ton eboh8hse ki eplouthse, egine omoios me olous tous allous kai kati xeiroteros.

Dikaiologietai, legontas, opws ta pa8hmata ton esklhrunan...

2
Alla na ki o allos opou ta huren etoima apo tous goneis tou, opou pote tou den usterh8hke, pote tou den elabe thn anagkh twn allwn, ki wstoso einai kai toutos egwisths kai filarguros oso ki ekeinos o prwtos.

Einai fronimos· den petaei to diko tou.

3
Toutos ein' enas, opou e8usiase ta niata tou ki esuna3e gia na xarei kai na timh8ei sta geramata. Twra bgainei ston peripato me to ama3i, ki ekei pou prwta kanenas den ton ekoitaze, twra ton xairetan oloi.

Euge tou. Autos ekator8wse o,ti esu pote den edunh8hkes. Kai einai zhthma an einai protimotero ta kala niata apo ta kala geramata.

4
Toutos ein' ekeinos opou apo thn hmera, pou tou eipes: "Proskunw" ki opou eskuyes ki eshkwses to mpastouni, pou tou eixe pesei apo to xeri, autos anebhke xwris xasomeria sto skali pou h kalosunh sou kai h gennaiothta tou ebale ompros tou.

Allo den ekame para pou episteye ki esebasthke thn idikh sou krish.
Twra einai mia megalh timh pou sou kanei an, diabainontas xtuphsei me to xeri tou apanou ston wmo sou kai sou eipei: "Kalhmera, file mou". Nomos fusikos, a3iwma gewmetriko· an apo duo ka8etes grammes, omoies kai parallhles, h mia anebei, h allh e3 anagkhs 8a meinei h xamhloterh.

5
Toutos ein' enas, opou panta, perimenei na 8usiazoun oi alloi gi' auton, enw pou autos mhte twra mhte pote 8a e8usiaze to paramikro gia tous allous.

Kai mhda autos 8a empodize h 8a ekatakrene tous allous, an ekanan ki ekeinoi to idion;

6
Toutos ein' enas filos sou, pou ton eixes daneisei mia fora liga xrhmata ki opou pote den esta8hke tropos na ta labeis opisw.

Esu eplerwses ena xreos ths kardias, ekeinos ena xreos tou mualou· eiste isa isa.
An h8eles, gia na mh zhmiw8eis, 8a emporouses na kameis to idio ki esu enos allou, o allos allou, kai paei leontas· ki etsi apo ena prwto kako paradeigma, sullogisou se ti 8a eftaname.

Apo keinhn th fora den tou 3anadwkes pleon tipota.

Kaka· epeidh kai san axariston paralogws, an ton eixes 8ewrhsei, kai pale eprepe na skefteis, opws einai anohsia na apaitei enas eugnwmosunh apo ta zwa gia ligh 8rofh pou tous dinei. An thn eixe labei, 8a htoun twra apo kairo 3odemenh· emporouse na ths [thn] eixe fagei kai kanenas katergarhs arrabwniastikos· etsi twra h proika ein' asfalismenh gia tous klhronomous ths.

Auth ws ta twra ekakozhse apo elehmosunes, kai ta e3oda ths dikhs, opou ein' akoma ekkremhs, ta exoun kamei ta ftwxa t' aderfia ths me megalh 8usia tous, ki exoun xa8ei kai ta e3oda mazi me thn proika.

Afou h dikh ein' ekkremhs, mhte h proika, mhte kai ta e3oda ein' akoma xamena gia th xhra kai t' aderfia ths. Alla kai xamena an htan gi' autous, den 8a htan xamena gia allous. Oi nomoi einai sofoi, oso einai kai h fusis sofh, opou adiaforei gia ta atoma kai pronoei monon gia th diathrhsh tou eidous, ki opou bganei apo th mesh t' adunata kai ta arrwsta gia na diathrhsei ta gera kai ta eurwsta.

40
Toutos ein' enas, opou ais8anetai polu ba8ia thn paramikrhn adikia pou na tou genei, ki opou omws teleiws den ais8anetai tes megaluteres adikies, opou na genoun stous allous.

41
