Kai ti kallitero dikaiologhma apo touto gia thn anabolh tou stefanwmatos;

Epe8ane epeit' apo kairo o pateras tou, kai omws den thn estefanw8hke.

8a eparousiasthke s' auto to anameta3u kapoios allos logos kai kapoio allo sumferon gia na mh to kamei. Kai gia tous orkous [den] ftaiei autos, alla ftaiei ekeinh, pou ton eixe upoxrewsei.

42
Alla na edw ki enas allos opou, xwris na uposxe8ei kai na kamei yeutikous orkous, thn ekakometaxeiristhke, kai sto ustero thn aparathse.

Ws kai gia touto ftaiei ekeinh, opou ton eixe balei sto dilhmma h na th stefanw8ei h na genei epiorkos.

43
Alla na ki enas tritos, an8rwpos ka8ws prepei, pou den eixe katadextei na kamei orkous ki opou monon uposxesh eixe dwsei mianhs ki epeita eleiye apo thn uposxesh tou.

Epeidh egnwrizen opws eixe thn ore3h ki ekeinh sto ba8mo, pou thn eixe ki autos, ki opws thn uposxesh thn h8ele gia ton tupo kai gia thn upolhyh ths, kai gia na mh elegx8ei, opws eixe klinei xwris mian uposxesh toulaxiston.

44
Toutos, ein' enas perifhmos poihths, opou sou eixe zhthsei na tou eipeis eilikrinws, th gnwmh sou gia ta erga tou, ki opou otan tou eipes opws den ta 8ewreis gia kala, sou exase thn upolhyh kai se ekame sxedon ex8ro.

Eixe dikio, epeidh autos den eixe thn paramikrhn amfibolia gia thn a3ia twn ergwn tou kai den se eixen anagkh na fereis krish esu. H gnwmh, pou autos ennoouse ki eperimene apo se, htoun na omologhseis, xwris na to kruyeis, kinoumenos apo kakosunh h zhleia, opws ta erga tou ta 8ewreis parapolu kala kai ka8ws ta 8ewrei o idios autos. Legontas tou, opws den einai kala, edei3es thn kakia sou kat' eme, thn anarmodiothta sou.

45
Kai toutoi oi duo, pou pan mazi einai duo filoi suggrafeis opou allhlokrinontai kai allhlo8aumazontai stes efhmerides.

H kalliterh oikonomia, pou 8a emporouse na genei. An den to ekaman autoi, pou einai kai filoi, 8a eplerwnan allon gia na to kamei, ki opou o allos den 8a to ekane mhte toso kala ki epithdeia.

46
Toutos, ein' enas, opou mia fora, pou eixes stamathsei kai kati eparathrouses apo3w apo ena argasthri, autos hr8e ki esta8hke ompros sou gia na parathrhsei ki autos, kai den se afhke ese na ideis.

To eixe kamei gia dokimh, gia na idei an euxaristiesai. An esu eixes ton ampwsei ligo kai perasei ompros apo keinon, ekeinos bebaia, sa logikos an8rwpos, 8a ephgaine sth douleia tou.

47
Toutos ein' ekeinos, opou sou eixe kleyei ena sidero spoudaio tou krebatiou sou gia na to fula3ei, mh tou xreiastei autounou kanenan kairo, gia mia douleia h allh.

Autos den egnwrize, opws ekeino to sidero htoun aparaithto gia na sth8ei to krebati sou· kai mhte emporouse na fantastei, opws 8a htan prama duskolo na paraggeilei na sou fkiasei allo o fauros.

48
Toutos ein' enas, opou eixe balei antikleidi kai eixe parei apo to surtari kapoias gunaikos mia posothta.

Timios an8rwpos kai sofos, epeidh an eixe ths ta parei me dolo kai apath, kata thn koinh kai genikh sunh8eia, 8a egenotoun extros me th gunaika, enw, pou etsi emeine filos, afou auth den egnwrize ton klefth· kai 8a thn upoxrewne na kata3odeutei kai sta dikasthria xwris thn paramikrh ths wfeleia.

49
Toutos ein' enas, apo keinous tous periergous patriwtes, opou, epeidh ein' apogonos tou Platwna kai tou Swkrath, exei thn a3iwsh na tou kanoun oi alloi xarismata.

Ein' e3upnos, kai den afinei na xa8ei eukairia, otan ein' o logos gia na wfelh8ei.

Otan omws tou eipan mia fora opws, sthn idiothta tou ekeinh san apogonou tou Platwna kai Swkrath, exei xreos kai kati na dwkei, estrabwse ta moutra tou.

Na pairnei xwris kai na dinei, akoma perissotero e3upnos.

50
Toutos, ein' enas politeuths, opou e8usiase thn anapayh tou kai meros tou ploutou tou gia na labei thn timh kai th do3a na ginei kopadiarhs kai na kubernhsei kala h kaka, opws mporesei.

Afou olos o kosmos to bebaiwnei, opws auto einai timh kai do3a, 8a htoun anohtos, an autos ekane e3airesh kai den to episteue, kai 8a htoun an8rwpos mikros, an den ekane ekeines tes 8usies gia na timh8ei kai na do3astei.

Twra sth nea 8esh tou, exei kai to kauxhma, opws mporei na simwnei kai ka8e prigkipa h basilea.

Kai taxa einai mikro h eukolo prama kai touto;

51
Toutos ein' enas allos politeuths, ikanos na milhsei treis wres aradiastes apanou sto idio 8ema, ki opou gia touto exei thn a3iwsh na ton kamome prw8upourgo.

Autos uposxetai kati, pou bebaia 8a to ektelesei, kai me tes agoreuses tou 8a mas pernaei toulaxiston h wra, enw, pou oi alloi h den briskontai se 8esh na uposxe8oun tipota h uposxontai ekeina, pou den 8a mporesoun na ta ektelesoun.

52
Toutos ein' enas timiotatos an8rwpos, alla yuxros kai filarguros, opou den 8elei na enoxlh8ei gia kanenan ki opou pote den exei kamei mian uphresia kanenos.

Epeidh gnwrizei kala tous an8rwpous.

Sxhmatizei anti8esh me enan allon, opou einai yeuths kai katergarhs ki opou omws prosferetai afilokerdws gia olon ton kosmo.

Epeidh tous gnwrizei ki ekeinos kallitera. To ena plerwnei to allo, ki a3izei o enas oso a3izei ki o allos.

53
Toutos ein' enas xristianos, apo tous sunh8ismenous, opou, epeidh exei loustei o Xristos ston Iordanh, pisteuei opws den einai opados tou Xristou, an den loustei ki autos, enw pou ap' osa [exei] dida3ei o Xristos den extelei tipota.

Polu swsta. Autos kanei ekeina, pou eixe kamei o Xristos, kai plerwnei papa gia na didaskei ekeina pou o Xristos eixe dida3ei· kai touto, gia na mh timwrh8ei autos se mia peristash, alla na timwrh8ei o a8wotatos o papas. Monon se touto to ustero exei adiko.

54
Kai toutos ein' enas astunomos, opou 8elei na kamei tous an8rwpous xristianous me to stanio, upoxrewnontas tous na kratoun kleismena thn Kuriakh ta magazia.

Afou h h8ikh tou Euaggeliou den efarmozetai kai den exteleitai olon ton xrono, as efarmozetai toulaxiston ki as exteleitai tes Kuriakades· ki afou den einai dunaton 8elhmatikws, as einai kai me to stanio, to kalo paradeigma.

55
Toutos ein' enas an8rwpos me paideia, kai me mualo, alla isxurognwmwn se ba8mo, pou, otan labei ena metro kai parei mian apofash, den thn allazei gia kanena dikio.

Epeidh einai sofos kai gnwrizei kai einai bebaios, opws den einai dunaton autos na eixe la8eyei sthn prwth skeyh, kai thn prwthn apofash tou.

56
Toutos einai enas noikatoras, opou afou eixe ka8usterhsei enos xronou noikia kai ton eixe parakalesei o ftwxos noikokurhs na tou adeiasei to spiti, xwris na ton upoxrewsei na kamei kai e3oda gia touto, legontas tou, opws tou xarizei ki osa xrwstaei, autos me to shmera kai me to aurio etrabh3e ompros akoma duo mhnes kai den adeiase to spiti para me to stanio ki afou o noikokurhs ekame ta e3oda.

Den emporouse autos na kamei diaforetika ap' o,ti kanoun oloi kai na xalasei ton nomo· kai htoun mia atimia ekeinh tou noikokurh na mh dwsei kallitera se touton ta xrhmata gia na fugei, para pou ta edwse tou dikhgorou.

57
Alla na ki enas allos xeiroteros, opou tou eixe dwsei kai xrhmata o noikokurhs me th sumfwnia na fugei, ki autos ephre ta xrhmata kai den efuge, kai upoxrew8hke epeita o noikokurhs na kamei deutera e3oda ston dikhgoro.

Htoun fusikon epomeno. Afou o noikokurhs tou edwse ompros kai sta xeria tou ta xrhmata, autos dikaiws esumperane, opws htoun metwrisma tou noikokurh, pou tou eipe na fugei ki opws skopos tou htoun aplws, na ton euergethsei m' ekeino to metwrisma, ki etsi, anti m' ekeina ta xrhmata na plerwsei to noiki tou neou spitiou, ka8ws, htoun taxates h sumfwnia, autos ta e3odeye, ka8ws eprepe, se kala giomata kai se deipna.

58
Toutos ein' ekeinos o mesiths, opou tou eixes dwsei na sou poulhsei ena epiplo me paraggelia na mh to dwsei ligotero apo ekato draxmes ki opou autos epeit' apo liges meres se eixe proskalesei na labeis e3hnta, me to dikaiologhma, opws mhte eixe brei perissotero mhte kai a3ize perissotero to epiplo sou.

Ekeinos h3ere kallitera apo se, epeidh htoun h texnh tou auth. Kai den htoun mhte dikio na ka8etai autos na perimenei, o 8eos to 3erei, ws pote, gia na bre8oun oi ekato draxmes, opou paralogws apaitouses h afentia sou.

Tou eixes kamei thn parathrhsh, alla mataiws, opws, afou den eurhke tes ekato draxmes, eprepe na sou eixe ferei opisw to epiplo.

Auto den tou to eixes 3exwrisei apo thn arxh· ki afou den tou to eixes 3exwrisei, autos fusika upe8ete, opws to nohma sou htoun na to bastaei aiwniws kai na to exei empodio oso na bre8oun oi ekato draxmes, prama adiko kai geloiwdes, ki opou autos ekame polu kala na dior8wsei, oxi monon gia to sumferon to diko tou, alla kai gia to diko sou akoma.

59
Toutos einai enas patriwths sou, pou sthn 3eniteia se eixe plhsiasei kai se piasei filon ki opou ekei tou eixes kamei polles kai diafores uphresies. Twra, pou egurisete ston topo sas, se apantaei kai mhte se xairetaei kai kanei opws den se gnwrizei.

Epeidh einai filotimos, ki epeidh den exei ton kairo kai ta mesa gia na sou kamei tes peripoihses, opou epi8umouse ki opou eixe xreos.

60
Toutos ein' enas, opou mia fora ton eixes boh8hsei kai eixe glutwsei mia kalh periousia, pou htoun se kintuno ki opou xwris ese to pi8anotato 8a thn exane. Autos gia eugnwmosunh sou eixe kamei totes ena gioma. Ki epeita apo kamposon kairo sou ekame kai deutero gioma. Ki ekei estamathse.

Polu swsta. Me to prwto gioma sou eixe dei3ei, opws einai eugnwmwn gia thn euergesia. Me to deutero, opws 8umatai kai 8a 8umatai panta thn euergesia. Ti allo apaitouses;

Ki otan epeita apo xronous eixes labei, kapoian anagkh kai tou eixes zhthsei na se daneisei mia mikrh kai tipotenia posothta, xwris kintuno kai zhmia tou, autos sou arnh8hke profasizomenos opws den exei.

To xwris kintuno kai zhmia tou to egnwrizes esu kai hsoun bebaios esu gia touto, den emporouse omws fusikw tw logw na to gnwrizei kai na einai bebaios ekeinos. Kai me thn euergesia, pou su tou eixes kamei, den eixes 8usiasei mhte riyokintuneyei tipota, enw pou autos twra eprepe na 8usiasei h toulaxiston na riyokintuneyei.

61
Toutos ein' enas opou, mhn exontas kanena allo pleonexthma gia na susth8ei me auto, kanei epidei3h tou ligou ploutou tou diathrwntas spiti megalo me uphretes kai bgainontas ka8emera peripato me to alogo h me to ama3i.

Ein' ekeino to pleonexthma, pou oloi to blepoun kai to ennooun perissotero para ka8e allo.

Osoi ton 3eroun, len opws, an akolou8hsei etsi, glhgora 8a meinei xwris tipota.

8a tou meinei panta h do3a kai h parhgoria, opws uphr3e gia kamposon kairo sebastos.

62
Kai toutos einai enas ftwxonoikokurhs, opou usterei to spiti tou apo ka8e kalo kai xreiazomeno gia na mporei na deixnetai o3w.

8a pei opws den ein' egwisths ki opws protimaei na euxaristaei ta matia tou kosmou para na frontizei gia thn kaloperash kai thn anapayh th dikh tou kai ths oikogeneias tou.

63
Touth einai mia kuria plousia kai elehmwn, opou thn elehmosunh thn kanei gia na epidei3ei ki opws gia touto 8a paei sthn kolash.

Gia keinon opou labainei einai teleiws adiaforo touto· ki o ka8enas exei xreos na gnoiastei gia th dikh tou thn yuxh ki oxi gia keinh tou allou.

64
Kai toutos ein' enas eugenhs, apo keinous, opou den ennooun na kamoun xarisma thn elehmosunh, alla pou 8eloun na thn plerw8oun me enan xoro kai me ena kalo deipno.

Epeidh einai metriofrones, ki epeidh den epi8umoun na exoun titlo sthn eugnwmosunh twn ftwxwn h sthn upolhyh tou koinou gia thn elehmosunh pou kanoun.

65
Toutos ein' enas, opou exei er8ei mia fora sto grafeio sou gia kapoian upo8esh ki opou sou eixe giomisei to patwma ftusies kai flemata.

Einai an8rwpos polu leptos, kai skopos tou htoun na sou dwkei ena ma8hma plagiws kai me eugenikon tropo. Eixe parathrhsei, opws to patwma sou den htoun oso eprepe pastriko, ki e8elhse me touto pou ekame na se eleg3ei kai se upoxrewsei na baleis na plunoun.

66
Toutos einai enas Despoths or8odo3os, apo ta merh ths Anatolhs, opou ais8anetai perissoterhn antipa8eia kai apostrofh pros kapoious allous Despotades, opou 3erw egw, para pros ton Papa h pros ton Arxirabbino.

Fusikotato! epeidh me tous allous Despotades kati eixe h exei akoma na moirasei, enw me ton Papa h me ton Arxirabbino den exei bebaia na moirasei tipota.

Kapoios mia fora ton eixe eleg3ei kai tou eixe 8umhsei ta paraggelmata tou Xristou, to "Agapa ton plhsion sou ws seauton", kai to "Agapate tous ex8rous sas".

Paralogismos, epeidh o Xristos gia plhsion ennohse monon th gunaika kai ta tekna tou ka8enos, h, to polu, kai tous goneis kai t' aderfia pou zoun mesa sto idio spiti· kai gia ex8rous den ennohse para ekeinous opou den pisteuoun san emas ki opou den einai or8odo3oi.

67
Kai toutos ein' enas kalogeros, opou zhtaei parades, kai tou dinoun oloi, gia th 8aumatourghn eikona enos agiou, pou exei sto kelli tou. Tou agiou tou exei anameno ena keri, ki autos xairetai ola ta epiloipa.

Amoibaia uphresia. Ki epeidh o agios den exei anagkh para monon apo ena kanthli h apo ena keri, opou mhte ki ekeino den to exei zhthsei pote, gia touto ki o kalogeros kanei polu fronima kai kratei gia ton eauto tou ta epiloipa kai den ta petaei h den ta xarizei allounou.

Kapoioi ton exoun eleg3ei, opws einai kerdoskopos kai katergarhs· alla poia h wfeleia, afou o polus kosmos auta den ta noiw8ei;

H kerdoskopia den einai katergaria· ki afou oloi oi an8rwpoi, ws ki oi idioi oi basileis, me enan kai allon tropo kerdoskopoun kai gelan, xwris idea bebaia mhte iskio katergarias, o enas ton allon, den blepw to dikio giati na kamei e3airesh kai na mh kerdoskophsei ki o dustuxos o kalogeros.

68
Toutos ein' enas rwmios apo kei katou, pou suzhtei aiwniws gia ka8e prama ki opou, antilegei susthmatikws se ola, ws kai se keina pou autos ta pisteuei ki opou den amfiballei gi' auta.

Epeidh, sa gnhsios rwmios, opou einai, ais8anetai sfodron erwta pros thn alh8eia, ki epeidh epi8umei na bre8ei h alh8eia.

69
Toutos ein' enas, opou eixe se mis8wsh gia deka xronia ena kthma ki opou gia tria xronia etrwge to eisodhma xwris na plerwnei to mis8wma. O noikokurhs, epeit' apo ta tria xronia, ton eixe parakalesei na tou dwsei me to kalo thn katoxh, xwris na ton upoxrewsei, na kamei e3oda gia na thn labei, alla o mis8wths arnh8hke, kai o noikokurhs upoxrew8hke ki ekame ta e3oda ki ephre to kthma.

Fusikotato, epeidh h katoxh den paraxwreitai para dia ths bias. Einai pote dunaton na pareis me to kalo kokkalo apo tou skulou to stoma;

70
Kai toutos akoma ein' enas allos apo keinous tous parapollous, agrammatous kai grammatismenous, xwriates kai kaloana8remenous, opou den upotassontai ston or8on logo kai sto dikio para me to stanio ki afou fan, an xreiastei, kai 3ulo.

Kai touto aploustato. Autoi pei8ontai kai upotassontai se enan allon or8on logo kai ena allo dikio megalutero, opou einai na koita3oun to diko tous sumferon ki oxi to sumferon tou allounou. Ki an ta gomaria, pou einai gomaria, exoun arketh krish gia na 3exwrizoun kai gia na sebontai auto to ustero dikio, polu perissotero toutoi, pou einai logikoi an8rwpoi.

71
Toutos ein' enas arxontas 3epeshmenos, opou den ntrepetai na kamei mia pra3h ki allh alh8ina a3ia ntrophs, ki opou ntrepetai omws na fernei sto xeri o idios to ywni tou spitiou tou, ki opou me olh tou th ftwxeia kai th stenoxwria, plerwnei paidi gia na tou to ferei.

Aploustato. Oi pra3es, opou kanei mporei na ton atimazoun, den tou afairoun omws apo thn arxontia. To koubalhma tou ywniou, xwris na ton atimazei, tou afairei apo thn arxontia.

72
Toutos ein' enas dikhgoros, opou eixe sunennoh8ei me ton antidiko sou kai se eixe prodwsei.

Epeidh 8a eixe katalabei apo thn poreia ths dikhs kai 8a eixe peis8ei, opws h dikh gia se einai xamenh, ki ezhthse na wfelh8ei kati autos xwris kamia dikh sou zhmia kai me zhmia monon tou antidikou sou.

73
Touth einai mia gunaika enos ftwxou texnith, pou epeidh h8ele na trwgei duo karbelia thn hmera ki o antras ths den eprof8aine kai ths ekane parathrhsh, auth eparaponiotoun stes geitonisses, opou ths edinan dikio, legontas, opws den prepei na genetai parathrhsh sto fagi.

Eixan dikio. O antras ths eprepe na ths fernei ena karbeli, kai n' afinei ekeinh na tou kanei parathrhsh autounou, giati den fernei duo.

74
Toutos, opou o kosmos ton koitazei kai ton kamarwnei, ein' enas prigkipas apo thn Ollandia, pou etuxe ki egennh8hke prigkipas, fantazetai opws einai gia touto diaforetikos, ki opws, san an8rwpos, a3izei perissotero apo mas tous allous.

Ki a3izei bebaia· epeidh an den htoun etsi, den 8a eixe kai ton titlo prigkipou.

Ki an htoun dunaton na tou apodei3eis to enantio, me touto den 8a ekator8wnes mhte autounou n' alla3eis th gnwmh, mhte kanenos allou.

Monon ta paidia kai oi zourloi allazoun eukola gnwmh.

Mhte autos dinei 8arros kanenos, mhte kaneis tolmaei na labei to paramikro 8arros mazi tou.

Ekeinos kanei polu gnwstika kai den katebainei· o allos pale kanei to xreos tou, kai malista opou ennoei kai ais8anetai th gaidourothta tou ompros tou.

75
Toutos ein' enas polu a3ios epixeirhmatias politeuths opou, an tou empisteuomaste to timoni ths politeias, 8a mas ebgane apnixtous kai zwntanous kai me wraion kairo kai me mpounatsa olous mas o3w ston ammo.

Ein' o idios autos opou mia fora eixe para3eneutei, kai me polu tou dikio, giati den saturizome keinon ton allon...

Alla na ki o allos. W posh diplwmatikh sobarothta, posh megaloprepeia fersimatos!

Na me sumpa8hsei o prwtos, an esfala· toutos einai gia th douleia th dikh mas...

Alla na ki enas tritos opou, banw ekato stoixhmata, exei ola ta prosonta pou exoun ki oi duo prwtoi· alla toutounou to 8ewrhtiko san kai na mas uposxetai kati akoma· exei lamprotero to anasthma kai yhlous tous kollarous ki einai kai perissotero kordwmenos...

Twra eskotisthka...

76
Toutos ein' enas an8rwpos koinos kai ashmantos, opou eixe balei polla mesa gia na mporesei na labei ena parashmo ki opou ekator8wse kai to elabe.

Einai ponhros. Den to h8ele gia na susth8ei autos, epeidh gnwrizei opws to parashmo ekeino den exei kamian a3ia· alla gia na kakosusth8ei ekeinos opou to edwse.

77
Kai toutos pale ein' enas allos, opou me polla mesa kai parakaleses, kata th sunh8eia, eixe labei ki autos ena parashmo. Thn hmera, pou to eixe labei oi suggeneis sto spiti tou ton agkaliazan, ta paidia tou efilousan to xeri, kai touton ton ephran ta dakrua.

Me touto o an8rwpos apodei3e, opws den htoun kai teleiws petra.

78
Touth einai mia kalogrha, pou fulaei thn par8enia ths gia na genei numfh tou Xristou. Gia touth paei kala, kai to katalabainome. To kako einai gia ton dustuxo ton kalogero, opou 8eloun ap' auton na fulaei thn par8enia tou, xwris elpida na mporesei pote na genei o numfios kamianhs agias.

Gia touto to dikio ki autos tous gelaei kai oikonomietai edw katou se enan tropo kai allon ki opws ton bolesei kallitera.

79
Toutos ein' enas 3enos Presbus, opou den exei kamia douleia na kamei ki opou akriboplhrwnetai gia na kalietai se giomata kai na diaskedazei kai na xoreuei olon ton xrono.

Antiproswpeuei ton basilea tou sto 3eno Kratos kai xrhsimeuei san enas kalos suntrofos kai mia kalh aformh ston filon basilea tou 3enou Kratous, gia na mporei na kanei sumposia kai na xoreuei ki autos.

80
Kai toutos o allos, opou ephge konta tou, ein' enas 3enos prigkipas, opou ka8e ashmanth frash tou epanalabainetai san na htoun a3iwma kanenos megalou sofou.

Touto fernei wfeleia ston prigkipa xwris na fernei kai kamia zhmia stous allous· kai mesa se kapoies spaniotates anohsies kai anapodies, opou e3airetikws exei o kosmos, an einai mia kai touth, den einai tipota.

81
Toutos ein' enas a3iwmatikos, opou afinei to spa8i tou kai sernetai kai brontaei se olon ton dromo.

Gia na eidopoiountai oi diabates, mh tuxei kai skounth3ei kanenas apanou tou.

82
Toutos ein' enas, opou den 8a ekane yeutikon orko, api8wnontas to xeri tou apanou se agia leiyana, pou 8a ton ekane omws, api8wnontas to apanou sto Baggelio.

Aploustato. Epeidh ta agia leiyana einai polu pleon konta me tous agious, par' o,ti einai to Baggelio me ton Xristo.

Exei to paradeigma enos allounou, pou mia fora eixe kamei yeutiko orko, api8wnontas to xeri tou apanou sto swma den 8umoumai poianou agiou, kai eixe timwrh8ei polu austhra gia touto, enw pou tosoi alloi pou ton kanoun ka8emera apanou sto Baggelio, den pa8ainoun tipota.

Ta paradeigmata o 8eos den ta dinei ka8emera, alla ka8e tosous xronous, mia fora· kai den ta dinei mhte fanera, alla kapws skepasmena gia na menei panta kai kapoia amfibolia, pou einai xreiazomenh gia ton peirasmo.

83
Toutos pale ein' enas allos, opou kanei yeutikon orko me olhn thn eukolia api8wnontas to xeri tou opou ki an tou eipoun.

Epeidh isws einai apo keinh thn ta3h twn an8rwpwn, opou pisteuoun adikws kai paralogws kai xwris apodei3h, opws ola ston kosmo, mhn e3airwntas, mhte kai ta idia t' agia monasthria, einai yeutia kai katergaria kai potapo sumferon, ki opou gelasei ki opou prwtarpa3ei, ki opws ola ein' a3ia gia klwtsies· ki epeidh, sto ustero, den tou kakofainetai mhte ki autounou mia tetia katastash, pou ap' auth den exei kamia zhmia, alla malista wfeleia.

84
Toutos ein' enas lebenths foustanelas apo ton Mwria, apogonos kai toutos tou Platwna kai tou Swkrath, opou parwdei th foresia, pou enan kairo htoun timhmenh kai twra den einai, ki opou pisteuei, opws otan mia gunaika suzei anomws me enan antra, einai dikaiologhmenos ka8e allos antras n' anebei sto spiti ths me to kalo h me to stanio, ws kai skalwnontas apo to para8uri kai 3ekeramidwnontas th skeph.

Logikotato! epeidh h timh ths gunaikos, afou suzei anomws me enan antra, einai ki einai 8usiasmenh· wste den menei allo para h kakosunh ths kai to brwmero to peisma an auth den stergei na exei thn porta ths anoixth gia ka8e gaidaro, pou h8el' exei thn ore3h.

85
Toutos ein' enas, opou ta eixe fkiasei me mia grha 8eia ebdomhnta xronwn, gia na dunh8ei na simwsei thn nea thn aniyia, ki opou ustera thn ebare8hke kai touth kai ta esumfwnhse me th deka3hxronitikh doula.

Bebaia· epeidh to n' arxisei apo th mikrh doula gia na ftasei sthn ebdomhntara th 8eia, htoun oxi monon afusiko, alla kai duskolo kai sxedon adunato.

86
Toutos ein' enas apo keinous tous Xristianous, opou protimoun na fan ywmi zumwmeno me apluta kai brwmera xeria Xristianou, para me pastrika kai sapounismena Ebraiou.

Aploustato· epeidh ta xeria tou Ebraiou den exoun to agio muros opou exoun ekeina tou Xristianou.

87
Toutos ein' enas geros plousios, filozwos oso kai ponhros, opou epeidh upopteuetai kai sumperainei, opws oi suggeneis tou den blepoun thn wra pote na pe8anei gia na ton klhronomhsoun, ekame dia8hkh gia na tous timwrhsei kai ta afinei ola se 3enous.

Epeidh 8a gnwrizei, opws oi 3enoi ekeinoi einai h8ikoteroi ki opws an htan suggeneis autoi, 8a eparakaliontan na zhsei xilia xronia.

88
Toutos pale ein' enas allos geros, opou exei suggeneis kati an8rwpous h8ikws tipotenious, opou den tous agapaei kai den tous exei se upolhyh, ki opou omws tous afinei klhronomous gia ton monon logon opou einai suggeneis.

Kai toutos fronima, epeidh pros tous 3enous, as htan kai oi kalliteroi, den exei kanena xreos· kai epeidh san timios kai kalos poliths sebetai ton nomo, pou 8a ta edine stous suggeneis, an autos epe8aine xwris dia8hkh.

89
Kai toutos ein' enas plousios aklhros, opou thn periousia tou 8a thn afhsei, leei o kosmos, klhronomia se ena prigkipa.

E3upnos an8rwpos kai toutos. An den thn afhsei se prigkipa, 8a thn afhsei e3 anagkhs se enan h perissoterous allous, opou den 8a einai prigkipoi, dhl. opou 8a einai an8rwpoi tipotenioi kai maskarades san auton. Kai xwrista apo touto, afinontas thn se prigkipa, tou menei kai h timh kai h do3a, opws euergethse prigkipa.

90
Toutos ein' enas daskalos 8eosebhs kai filogiortos apo keinous, opou to ena trito tou xronou to kleftoun twn ma8htwn me tes giortades, opou bastan exontas kleismeno to sxoleio tous.

Autos gia touto ein' a3iepainos, ki ws kai oi ma8htes einai sumfwnoi, epeidh an den htoun sumfwnoi, 8a tous htoun polu eukolo na metriasoun ton 8rhskeutiko zhlo twn daskalwn katebazontas tous to ena trito tou mis8ou h plerwnontas tous oxi me to toso ton mhna, alla me to toso thn hmera.

H Kubernhsh pou toso deixnei na endiaferetai gia ta sxoleia, gia touto to prama adiaforei.

H Kubernhsh, apo touto den exei kamia zhmia· kai apaitei monon apo tous daskalous na kanoun ta xreh tous taxtika kai na efodiazontai kai me ta biblia, pou h Kubernhsh tous sustainei.

91
Toutos ein' enas giatros, opou kanei diagnwses xwris na einai panta bebaios gi' autes, ki opou kata kanona tou leipoun ta mesa ths 8erapeias twn diaforwn as8eneiwn.

Panta 3erei autos polu perissotera apo mas kai panta, otan de sumbei na genei epizhmios, mporei na sumbei na genei wfelimos.

Exei susthma na mh enantiwnetai sth gnwmh enos sunadelfou, pou na einai filos tou, kai na enantiwnetai se keinh enos allou, pou me auton den ta exei kala.

Epeidh, sa giatros opou einai, gnwrizei, opws kai h mia gnwmh kai h allh den wfelei ton arrwsto· ki afou einai touto, giati na mh wfelh8ei toulaxiston autos;

Kata kanona mhte pou problepei kai pronoei, ka8ws 8a eixe xreos, kanontas prosextikous tous pelates tou se ena h allo pou mporei na tous sumbei, kai malista sthn anarrwsh.

Gia touto den tou perisseuei kairos, kai mhte ein' h douleia tou auth· h douleia tou einai monon na krazetai kai na phgainei, otan parousiazetai h arrwstia kai na thn parakolou8ei pista ws to telos, ki oso pou na ton bare8oun kai na tou eipoun "Ftanei".

92
Toutos ein' enas xamalhs, opou epeidh mia fora sto Telwneio tou eixan xarisei ton dasmo, pou 8a eplerwne se mia kofa prama, toutos, fernontas sou thn kofa sto spiti, apaitouse me epimonh kai me fwnes rhtws gia ton logon auton, na tou dwseis diplh plerwmh apo to kanonismeno ki apo th diatimhsh.

Polu or8a, kai me apodei3h ma8hmatikh. An eplerwnes ton dasmo, den 8a eplerwnes perissotera; Kai loipon, plerwnontas autounou to diplo, den 8a eixes zhmia, alla panta wfeleia. Kai ston idion kairo 8a ekanes kai mia dikaiotathn euergesia.

93
Toutos ein' enas penhtas poihths, opou xanei ton kairo tou kai grafei kai dhmosieuei stixous, opou den tou plerwnontai mhte ki apo keinous opou ton ennooun kai ton ektimoun ki opou tous exoun geutei kai apolayei tous stixous tou.

Fusikon epomeno, afou tous stixous ekeinoi mhte tous ezhthsan, mhte pou tous esumfwnhsan.

Kai na ephgaine na tous eurei, kai pale 8a ton epairnan gia zourlon kai 8a ton ediwxnan.

Gia to idio dikio, kai malista opou oi stixoi, gia oso ki an einai kaloi kai ouranokatebatoi, den 8ewrountai san apolayh, pou na isodunamei mhte me thn pleon metria pastitsada.

94
Toutos ein' enas, opou apo ftwxos eginhke plousios me ta prostuxia, opou exei yhsei th ftwxologia, ki opou kai twra akoma, pou eplouthse ki opou egerase, akolou8aei na exei skopo ths zwhs tou authn thn idia douleia gia na dunh8ei n' afhsei oso einai tropos perissotera ston klhronomo tou, pou, meta3u twn allwn, den einai polu kalliteros ap' auton.

An h ftwxologia htoun sth 8esh toutounou kai toutos sth 8esh ths ftwxologias, ta idia 8a epa8aine kai toutos apo th ftwxologia. Oloi oi an8rwpoi exoun xreos na koita3oun na wfelh8oun, ki oloi wfeliwntai poios me ton enan tropo kai poios me ton allon pros blabh kai zhmia twn loipwn, kai touto e3 anagkhs. Kai stes upo8eses sumferontos einai swsto kai den prepei na milei h kardia· kai se polles peristases, tolmaw na eipw, mhte ki o idios o nous.

95
Toutos ein' enas, opou eixen afhsei ton kalon kai agaphmenon tou aniyio ki exa8hke, 8ewrwntas opws eixe xreos o asplaxnos o pateras na ton glutwsei.

Den e8elhse autos na genei kako paradeigma, gia na adiaforoun epeita oi goneis gia ta tekna, afinontas tous allous na frontizoun gi' auta.

96
Touth einai mia ftwxh gunaika, pou eixe oikonomhmenes xilies draxmes, ki opou enas, gia na dunh8ei na tes balei sto xeri, den eurhke allon kalliteron tropo para na th stefanw8ei.

Timios an8rwpos, epeidh h8ele na tes parei nomimws kai oxi anomws.

Eikosi meres epeit' apo ton gamo, ki afou h kalotuxh ekaloperase ap' ola mazi tou, ton exase xwris na 3erei pou phge· ki akoma, pou einai twra deka xronia, ton karterei.

Afou ton karterei, 8a eipei opws den exase akoma kai thn elpida.

Monon mia fora eixe ma8ei apo enan patriwth, opou kapou ton eixe idei se makruno meros.

Kalo kai touto, opou ema8e opws zei kai den epe8ane gia na balei ta maura.

97
Kai toutos ein' enas, opou eixe kamei to idio me mian allh, me th diafora opou toutos ephre polla pou eftanan ki eperisseuan kai gi' auton kai gia th gunaika, ki opou, gia touto den thn afhse kai na fugei krufa ka8ws eixe kamei o allos, molopou touth htoun kai mia panoukla. Zei kai kalozei apo ta eisodhmata ths, diaskedazei me olous tous tropous, kai diathrei kai mia deuterh gunaika o3w apo to spiti.

Ola auta einai kala kai nomima kai me thn adeia tou Despoth· kai monon ekeino ths deuterhs gunaikos 8a htoun kako kai anomo sthn peristash, pou h gunaika tou h8ele kator8wsei na ma8ei kai akolou8ws kala n' apodei3ei... kai ta loipa, zhtwntas gia touto apo ta dikasthria thn timwria tou kai th fulakish tou.

98
Toutos ein' enas ieromonaxos, opou upokrinetai ton swfrona ki opou omws exei mian agaphtikia.

E3airetos kai fusikotatos sumbibasmos. Ypokrinetai ton swfrona gia na euxaristhsei thn koinwnia pou to apaitei, ka8ws to 8elei o 8eos· ki exei krufa thn agaphtikia gia na euxaristhsei ton eauto tou pou to apaitei e3isou, ka8ws to 8elei h fusis. An eixe duo agaphtikes, totes kai monon 8a htoun a3iokatakritos.

99
Alla na ki enas allos ieromonaxos, opou den exei mia kai duo, alla exei treis agaphtikes.

Apo mia ki apo duo, einai protimotero oi treis, ws kai upo h8ikhn epoyh. An einai mia, auth h mia mporei n' arwsthsei, mporei a3afna kai na pe8anei, ki o ieromonaxos na meinei ston aso kai na ka8etai na karterei oso na brei allh. An einai duo, autes oi duo den mporei na leiyei pou na to ma8oun h mia gia thn allh kai na zhleyoun kai na piastoun kai na kamoun skhnes kai na ekte8oun kai na ek8esoun kai ton ieromonaxo. Otan omws 3eroun opws einai treis, totes apelpizontai kai ka8ontai hsuxes kai euxaristhmenes.

100
Touth einai mia nea, pou dernei th mana ths.

Einai polla paidia ston topo mas, pou dernoun tous goneous. Ki afou exei aformh, ki afou einai dunatoterh sta xeria, ki an malista ths dinei kai trwgei ths manas, giati na mh thne deirei; Mhda kai h idia h mana ths den thn ederne authne, otan htoun mikrh; Monon na thn skotwsei 8a htoun kako.

Einai omws timiotath nea me t' onoma, pou fulaei thn par8enia ths oso mporei.

Touto t' a3izei ola· kai touto, sumfwna me ta aparamilla ellhnika h8h, einai h bash ka8e areths· ki otan einai touto, mporei, me thn adeia ka8e Ypourgeiou, na genei kai kura daskala.

To dixtu tou errixte anoixta, to fanaraki, kremezi,

Ap' alogisia trixa olh plegmenh

stroggulh, gialikath, astrifth, fina,

to edafos, pou 'tan toso stereo, upexwrhsen e3afna san

Oso ki an hsoun epide3ios sth diapragmateusi,

8a 'brhs to petrino kefali ths momfhs.

To spiti steketai xwris skies
mes sthn akinhth pura ths meshmbrias.
O hlios katergazetai tis ules,
skebrwnei keramidia kai 3uleies,

mia mustikh swreia gegonotwn·

mias sauras· peripeteies pouliwn,

Ston e3wsth,
anaskela ston hlio, me8usmenos

An den forouse thn prasinh stolh,
8a emoiaze san allos enas neos
ap' tous pollous pou stegase to spiti
mes ston aiwna ths zwhs tou. K' etsi
koimwmenos, xwris fwnh kai blemma,
duths boubos stous dikaious bu8ous

Amerimno to spiti proxwrei
mesa sthn wra, pros to bradu· plousio

Wsan ta karra pou gurizoun ap' t' ampelia

To spiti ezhse polles zwes.
Htan aperanto gia ta mikra paidia,
gemato mu8ous kai musthria, me polu

anh3eros pws wfeile sto spiti

thn epoxh pou peftoun ta ortukia

Ki ws kataionizetai to skotos, sbhnontai oi leptomereies tou kosmou kai phdw apo to spiti -barka st' aba8h nera, perpataw epi twn udatwn, ustera epi ths ammou bgainw sthn aulh ths 8alassas opou me upodexontai kalamia, pikrodafnes ki etera nuktobia futa. Eimai dwdekaeths, leukontumenos, isws perituligmenos gazes h faskies, sentoni, ws nekros buzantinhs eikonas s' eparxiakh basilikh, kati meta3u oneirou kai pragmatikothtos h palaioxristianikhs fantasiwsews.
Basanizomai suxna apo eikones tetoies h paromoia enupnia, les ki oti peridiabazw se mia patridognwsia m' ef8armenes mnhmes, opou, meta3u twn allwn, lamnei thn palia ths lembo h Baggeliw, sunomhlikh, agorokoritso, ena ap' ta enteka paidia, to a3iotero, tou Kuklwpa, aneyia tou Araph, aliewn apo thn arxaia Iwnia kai 3erizwmenwn sto '22. Ol' auta ston maiandro ths topikhs mas paralias, opou enallassontai ta kentra diaskedasews -"Faros", "Oasis" kai "Lou3embourgon"- me ta nauphgeia, ligo pio edw apo ton aleuromulo tou Alatini, pou, pelwrio ktisma, ka8reftizetai sta hrema nera tou texnhtou kolpiskou, opou, nuxta mera, proseggizoune maounes gia ekfortwsh h fortwsh. Pera o braxionas, protetamenos -to Karampournaki- allos topos, alloi maiandroi, elaxistes oi empeiries prin to '37. Ekei kleinei kai o paidikos orizontas, to 8alassio xwrafaki pou to diasxizei h Baggeliw ta bradia tou kalokairiou, epanw katw, dialalwntas "ena talhro h bolta" me th barka -to prwi mazeuei dixtua, mudia, paragadia, petradakia, ton xeimwna erxetai sxoleio, analogws tou kairou kai kata diasthmata. Leei ki ekeinh, bebaiwnei, "paizw sthn aulh ths 8alassas", eite katoikei sto 3ulino paraphgma tous, eite mes sth barka ths, opou exei balei bolika ma3ilarakia, kenthmena, gia tous epibates ths.
Kai h Baggeliw dia8etei plousia gnwsh, eite tou afrou eite tou pu8mena, pou boutaei atromhta kai anasurei th 8alassia pramateia ths. Ara 3erei gia aules ths 8alassas kai ths sterias. Oloi oi alloi eimaste mamo8refta, kaloplumena kai kalosiderwmena, me artia bebaiws thn or8ografia ma kai thn propaideia, enw ekeinh trwei suxna 3ulies sta maura daxtula - xwris na klaiei, oute na dakruzei kan.

Ema8a na kolumpaw dwdekaeths, kat' arxas sthn epikrateia ths 8alassas ths Baggeliws, upobastazomenos ap' thn kura Maria, opou mas sugkentrwne san klwssa, plh8os geitonopoula kai mas odhgouse mexri ton gialo, mazi kai th mikrh Elenh ths kai mas didaske na pleoume, me ta autosxedia mpaniera mas ki oxi opws ekeinh pou kolumpage forwntas rompa ki or8ia h ka8isth. H egnoia mas na ma8oume na pleoume mia wra arxitera enisxuotan ap' to oti o bu8os, rhxos ki epilegmenos gia ta mpogia mas, htan egkatesparmenos me karfia kai tenekedes, ap' to diplano ekeino nauphgeio Mpleka, pou mas kobane h mas trupousan stis euais8htes patouses mas.
Ol' auta prin ap' ton polemo. Opws kapws megalwsame, sthn katoxh ki h kura Maria eixe pleon alles egnoies, polupoikiles, ma ki emeis de 8elame khdemonia, oute alla ma8hmata gia thn kolumbhsh. 3anoixthkame se alles 8alasses -geitonikes ki autes- kai stis aules tous. Kai 3exasthke ki h Baggeliw ki oloi oi dikoi ths ki oi kourites tous, pou twra trexane nux8hmeron sta maura kai epikerdh emporia.
Etsi, me nees parees, sthn pleioyhfia agoristikes, phrame tous allous dromous, brhkame nees aules, to "Tamari3" kuriws, opou empaines plhrwnontas. Dipla akribws ton Nautiko ton Omilo, me to arxontiko diwrofo kai th 8aumasia ammoudia, sth 8alassa, omws kai e3w, sthn aulh me tis ompreles, tis wraies nees, tous gerodemenous kurious, tous austhrous. Paradipla thn aulh tou iatrou Bainanidh me tis kalamies, parapera ena axrhsimopoihto makrosteno oikopedo pou ekteinotane ap' thn akrogialia mexri th lewforo kai ta tram ki opou uphrxane dekades peuka. Ton tropo ergasias mou, sxedon panta me bash t' anamnhstika, ton exw anaferei sthn analutikh eisagwgh twn poihmatwn "Eikones", pou tupw8hkan sta 1944, ka8ws kai sto tupwmeno to 1963 pezografhma: "Arxitektonikh ths skorpias zwhs".
    T' anamnhstika pou fulagw, e3akolou8oun panta na mou dhmiourgoun pashs fusews problhmata, arxinwntas apo 8emata katata3ews twn, katalhgontas de sto 8ema to pou 8a xwresoun, giati par' olo oti kata kairous exw axrhsteusei polla, pisteuontas, oti ta eixa e3antlhsei, panta au3anoun me swriasma kainourgiwn, konta se osa distazw h lupamai na katastreyw.
    Prwth epe3ergasia tou ulikou apotelei h katanomh tou se koutia diafora.
    Αuton ton kairo, sto dwmatio pou ergazomai, prospa8w na ta xwresw se eikosi megala koutia, pou ta paraggeila eidika, to f8inopwro.
    H douleia enw sthn arxh phgaine sbelta, arxise pali na ka8usterei kai touto, oxi mono giati exw katalabei, pws de 8a xwresoun ston ka8orismeno ari8mo koutiwn, alla giati sto meta3u arxisa na dierwtwmai, an den einai au8airetes oi kathgories diakrisews, kai an taxa, den dhmiourgeitai pali etsi, mia nea akatastasia, pou me duskoleuei na 'brw, th stigmh pou to skeftomai, auto pou 8elw kai mou xreiazetai.
    Entwmeta3u, h ka8e anamoxleush den perna xwris n' afhkei polla xrhsima sthn yuxh, to nou kai thn fantasia.

1. "Oi perissoteres hmeres tou htan hmeres kourasmenes kai arrwstes, apo to prwi pou toso duskola shkwnotan, isame ta mesanuxta pou den ebriske upno sto krebbati tou, ekneurismenos.

Omws ws aphnhs diwkths, twn 3ulinwn zwgrafistwn sumbolwn, me ta opoia o an8rwpos parhgoreitai, gia ka8e enskuptousa epi ths idias autou kefalhs sumfora, afhnontas thn yuxh tou na ta3ideuei eleu8era, katanowntas ta uper noun, pei8omai oti dikaia bristhke kai 8ewrh8hke ole8rios.

Αuta ola ka8olou den empodizoun, ton suntassonta thn xronikh grafh ekeinhs ths epoxhs, na anaferei en pash leptomereia, olh th seira twn epeisodiwn, ths meta thn enhlikiwsh e3eli3hs, tou sofou en th mwria tou brefous se aisxro kai eleeino me8uso.

Auto to dromo sunexizontas, katelh3e na dolofonhsei to 8eio tou Barda, pou uphretwntas tis adunamies tou, san htan paidi, ton xalase.

Tou fwnazan loipon tou Basilha, me to dikio tous, "ouai, ntroph kai aeipter".
O Mixahl gia mia stigmh 8umwne kai e3orgizotan. Epeita omws, sto dromo pou tou wrise, kanontas ton basilha to eleos tou 8eou, adiaforei glentwntas me ta aloga kai tis gunaikes.
Banw me to nou mou, oti kapoia ap' autes, 8a mporouse na tou elege xadiarika, to parakatw tragoudaki:

"Tsoutsouriko mou kale,
omorfe kai strompoule,
8a se kamw 'gw gampro.
Na ntu8eis n' armatw8eis,
sth fwlitsa sou na mpeis".

Mh mporwntas na krinei, apanw s' osa pragmata blepoume, diaforetika apo ena mwro paidi, enw pia htan megalos, sta sigoura, me kati tetoia afelh stixourghmata, opou omws tautoxrona den krubontai, ta para ths h8ikhs aposiwpoumena, polu 8a diaskedaze.
H diaskedash tou, apanw s' osa 3eroume oti prepei na sebomaste, eftase mexri to shmeio na paradwsei thn adelfh tou th 8ekla sto Basileio.
O idios pantremenos nomima, glenta me thn eupreph kai wraia Eudokia tou Iggeros, pou telika thn pantreuei me ton Parakoimwmeno tou, upoxrewnontas ton na diazeux8ei, th nomimh gunaika tou Maria.
H Basilomhtwr 8eodwra pou agiase, apo ton kairo pou to paidi ths andrw8hke, kleisthke se Monasthri. Akougontas ekei gia th diagwgh tou, phgainei kai ton sumbouleuei. Tou leei na dei3ei kapoio sebasmo, banontas me to nou tou to megaleio tou a3iwmatos, pou tou 'dwke o 8eos kai prospa8wntas, na fanei kapws anta3ios.

Ta spa8ia 3exwrisan prwta ta xeria tou apo to kormi. Katopi tou truphsan ba8eia thn kardia kai ton anoi3an apo panw ews katw.

8. Wres kai meres. Perna o kairos grafontas. Ekama arxh thn teleutaia bdomada ths Apokrhas kai se treis meres einai to Pasxa. 8a prepei na teleiwnw skeftomai.

Pelagwnw se 8ewries, pou den apodeiknuoun tipota gia osa sumbainoun, alla mono thn adunamia mou na paraith8w, apo tis diafores apaithseis, pou ka8e fora me kanoun na nomizw, oti perikleioun olo to nohma ths zwhs.
Tsampounw kai lew diafora xamena logia.
Poies 8ewries; Αutes aforoun osous zoun tis proswpikes tous ais8hseis kai sunaptoun sxeseis me ton ena kai ton allo. Me ola ta pragmata.
Apo thn allh meria, einai autoxrhma geloio to na prospa8ei kaneis n' apodei3ei kati. 3emoiazei entelws me thn poikilia twn diaforwn ekeinwn, pou 3ekinwntas apo to arista sta ma8hmatika tou Gumnasiou, kataginontai na apodei3oun ton tetragwnismo tou kuklou. Tous aforhta egwkentrikous apotuxhmenous, pou 8eloun m' ena logo diko tous, na upokatasthsoun thn alh8eia twn pollwn anapnown.
Antikru mas o Logos tou Xristou zei, kai den exei anagkes twn apodeiktikwn 8ewriwn kanenos. Yparxei gia olous.
To ti exw na pw ein' allo pragma. Mia e3omologhsh, prokeimenou n' a3iw8w na ntu8w th stolh tou numfwnos.
Einai auto mia elpida megalh san thn glukeia Anoi3h, olwn twn etwn ths oikonomias ths oikoumenhs. Pro8uma upo thn ephreia ths, fortwnomai oles tis amarties kai agwnizomai na tis plunw.

9. Epistrefw stous tomous ths xronografias, prospa8wntas na sxhmatisw, to proswpo tou Leontos tou Sofou, pou eipa hdh oti diale3a kai ton agapw kai touto me boh8a polu.
Den anaferetai sto bio tou, na ekame pote kati to spoudaio. O xarakthras tou apo apoyh yuxologias, gematos antifaseis. To kuriwtero, den epedei3e pote 8elhsh anwterh, para mono ginatia proswpika, pou anastatwsan thn xwra tou. Anikanos na epimeinei se mia diakubernhsh swsth, efere to kratos tou se kaka xalia. Sunexws stous polemous apekomize httes. E3aitias tou xa8hkan eparxies oloklhres. Stis meres tou htan, pou diagoumhsan oi Sarakhnoi th 8essalonikh. Polles fores upexrew8h na sun8hkologhsei, me atimwtikous orous. Kate3eutelisthke ws afenths kai anwtatos arxwn. Epizhtouse tous erwtes, prospa8wntas na kamei ena paidi kai e3 aitias tou logou autou, a8etouse tous swstous nomous, pou eixe o idios 8espisei.
Den htan loipon dunato kapote na mh faei kamia katakefala.
Stis 11 tou Mah, pou einai h Panhgurh tou Ieromarturos, sthn Ekklhsia tou Agiou Mwkiou, kapoios me 3uloshmantro tou 'dwke mia sto kefali. Eutuxws, oti anekoye thn ormh tou xtuphmatos kapws, to anammeno polukanthlo, alloiws o Basilhas 8a phgaine.
8umwne ka8e fora pou eniw8e, oti tou fernontousan askhma, dixws omws na krataei polu h austhrothta tou.
Gia tous shmerinous an8rwpous, pou de stoxazontai, osa epikremantai panw apo ta kefalia tous, o elew Xristou tou A8anatou Basilews, Basileus Lewn, 8a emoiaze se polla asteios. Epishs etsi ws asteia sunh8ws logariazontai, apo tous sugxronous mas istorikous, ta pneumatika tou endiaferonta kai oi anhsuxies, to euros twn gnwsewn tou klp. Ola sterountai pantelws ka8e prwtotupias, lene. En sunexeia dusanasxetoun, pou enw eixe ma8hteyei konta ston Mega Fwtio, pou tosa apo tous arxaious, xamena pia gia mas, fernei konta mas me thn "Muriobiblo", o Lewn analambanontas thn e3ousia sta xeria, e3wrise ton diakekrimeno sofo sto Monasthri twn Armonianwn, pou epwnomazotan tou Bordwnos, paei na pei tou hmionou h moulariou. Krinoun tis basilikes suggrafikes enasxolhseis, ws stegnes antigrafes kai aneu pnohs eranismata, aforhth pezologia, pou mataia prospa8oun na dian8isoun ta anohta logopaignia, mania twn sxizofrenwn, pou areskontai na paizoun me tis kenes periexomenou le3eis, san me kompologi. 
Oloi sumfwnoun apanw st' oti uphr3e mega dustuxhma, pou o panta3ios, prwtos ths Makedonikhs dunasteias Basilhas, eixe enan tetoio ana3io diadoxo.
To dustuxhma gia mas tous newterous Ellhnes, einai oti th gnwmh auth, gia ton uphreth tou Xristou Basilea, plhn twn eiskomisantwn thn Dutikh an8rwpareskeia ws sofia, poikilwn logiwn, summerizetai enas poihths, pou epizhthse na 8ewrh8ei megalostomos, upoka8istwntas ton anamenomeno Messia, pou 8a diakanonize oristika kai mia gia panta, to peribohto glwssiko zhthma, opws to katanthsan, agnowntas th lush pou apo makrou, eixe oikonomhsei epi Tourkokratias akoma, h Ekklhsia.
O poihths loipon, legontas oti krata poimeniko aulo gia basilhades, dia makrou epanalambanei, oles tis dioshmeies pou anaferoun oi istorikoi, oti proanhggeilan apo ton kairo, pou htan brefos o Basileios, makrua apo th Basileuousa, oti ftanontas ekei 8a basileue. 
Oson afora gia thn proeleush tou Leontos siwpa, giati s' auth uparxei ena skotadi, entelws diaforo apo th skoteinh katagwgh tou rwmaleou antra, pou a3iw8hke energwn pantoiotropws, na ftasei sto uyhlo basiliko a3iwma.
To skotadi, oson afora thn katagwgh tou, paremeine s' olh th zwh tou Leontos, a3edialuto mesa tou.
Pote de mporese na ma8ei me bebaiothta, an htan no8os gios tou Oinoflugos Mixahl h tou epishmws feromenou ws patera tou Basileiou.
Tetoia krufa skotadia, t' apofeugoun sunh8ws, osoi poihtes areskontai stis 8riambologies kai thn eukolh fusiokratikh ermhneia, o,ti fwtizei h nuxta kai th skorpa h eperxomenh nea hmera.
Etsi h zwh katanta, ena polu eukolo kai diaskedastiko paixnidi, pou epitrepei ston ka8ena pou ta katafere na euporhsei, na 3exna olo to plh8os twn anwnumwn, pou h dustuxia tous afairei to proswpo.
O Αutokratwr, Lewn o St΄, o Sofos, neos akoma, sthn hlikia twn efhbikwn oneirwn, pou mas afhnoun anupoyiastous, makrua apo ka8e amfibolia, katadikasthke se fulakish kai ektopish, giati taxa eixe kata nou na skotwsei, ton patera tou Basileio, enw eixe 3ifoulkisei, 8elontas na ton swsei, sto dasos opou tou epete8h to agrio 8erio.
Ta logia pou akoume na epanalambanei, to mimhlo pthno, o papagalos, xwris kat' ousian na 3erei ti legei, perifronhtika t' apokaloume papagalismata, xarakthrizontas me ton auto tropo thn asunarthth fluaria twn omoiwn mas.
Omws xaris akribws sthn epanalhyh enos papagalismatos, apekatesta8h sth 8esh tou diadoxou, tou 8ronou pou tou anhke, o Kur Lewn.
"Αi! ai! Kur Lewn", eixe ma8ei na ton fwnazei o yittakos, pou se mia ai8ousa tou Ierou Palatiou, aiwrountan mesa s' ena kloubi kai o nearos diadoxos ton peripoiotan kai ton agapouse.
Αuta ta gegonota, sumfwna me osa tonizoun epimonws oi Xronografoi, alla3an entelws to nearo tote akoma an8rwpo. Makrunan ta mallia kai ta geneia tou, f8arhkan ta rouxa pou forage.
Einai eukolo na upo8esei kaneis, oti to onoma "Margariths" ths kamarhs, opou arxika enekleis8h, to ermhneue o idios sumfwna me th sumbolikh shmasia, pou pairnoun ta margaritaria ston upno kai ta oneira, dhlwnontas dakrua.
Auto to loutro twn dakruwn e3 allou, epitrepei kapoia susxetish, tou katopi sofou Basilha, me tous Osious anaxwrhtes, pou kalliergousan thn erhmo me roes dakruwn.
Me ton tropo auto, mporoume na doume apo mia nea pleura, tis katanuktikes omilies tou Basilews sthn Panagia kai ton Poliouxo ths 8essalonikhs, opou eixe e3oristei, ka8ws kai ta empneusmena, apo ta 11 "Ew8ina" anastasima apospasmata twn Euaggeliwn, poihmata, pou h Ekklhsia sumperielabe stis Akolou8ies, eu8us meta to dedo3asmeno, s' oles tis kardies twn pistwn, "Xristos Anesth".
O an8rwpos pou epezhse kai egine basilhas, xaris s' ena papagalisma alogou pouliou, me posh eudaimonia 8' apokrinontan akougontas to "Xristos Anesth" kai tsigkrizontas to kokkino t' augo, "Alh8ws Anesth".
Eixe empotis8ei thn eikona, ths aprosdiorisths ektashs ths dustuxias tou an8rwpou, gnwrizontas oti allo fws, pou na gemizei m' elpides to bio mas, den ufistatai apo ton anastanta Xristo.
O Xristos san kentro oxi aplws mono ths basilikhs tou skeyhs, alla oloklhrou tou zwikou organismou, me oles tis foberes adunamies kai tis anti8eseis opou periepipte, mporei na mas boh8hsei se mia dikaioterh ermhneia twn enasxolhsewn tou af' enos kai ths adiaforias tou af' eterou, gia para polla alla.
Ediw3e to Fwtio, giati edeixne ena pneuma empistosunhs pros thn an8rwpinh nohsh, parapanw tou deontos.
3erizwnontas apo mesa tou thn koinh logikh kai tis parwpides pou mas fora, anaforikws me thn 8ewrhsh twn an8rwpinwn, ereunouse epistamena tis le3eis kai tous tropous ths diatupwshs twn, san kuria organa ths ekfrashs tou an8rwpou, prospa8wntas me thn emba8unsh s' auta, na kator8wsei na upoyiastei kai na manteyei, ton en Arxh kai 8eo Logo tou Euaggeliou.
Etsi prepei e3 allou na katanoh8ei, oxi mono h lamprothta twn "Ew8inwn" tou poihmatwn, pou me thn pisth pou fanerwnoun, dieukolunoun thn koinh antilhyh, ths istorikhs kai pantotinhs parousias tou Xristou, alla kai ta paignidia me ta opoia pernouse tis wres tou, suntassontas frastikous "karkinous", niw8ontas xaroumenos, ka8e fora, pou safws petuxaine to grifwdes apotelesma.
As e3etasoume twra apo konta merikes pra3eis tou. Eixe mia erwmenh pou pe8ane. Ths extise mia ekklhsia, frontizontas gia th swthria ths sthn aiwniothta. H pra3h auth, apo monh ths, den arkei na fwtisei ta ba8utera tou kinhtra. Prepei na poume oti ekame akribws to idio, otan pe8ane h nomimh tou suzugos. Ths ektise epishs mia ekklhsia wraiotath. Kata ba8os h3ere, oti ola ta tou kosmou, ektos tou Oikou tou 8eou kai tou di' autou Agiasmou twn pragmatwn, einai ena paignidi.
Den h3ere n' agapa, opws oi enhlikes, en onomati ths parexomenhs euxaristhsews, alla opws ta paidia, pou den exoun eiseti oloklhrwsei swma diko tous kai ta aresei na phgainoun, konta stous allous pou exoun kormi, gia na fantastoun, oti kai ta idia megalwnoun.
Kat' auton ton tropo agapouse parafora, ton ka8ena pou eblepe, 3exnwntas ton eu8us meta pou mia porta 8a ton ekrube.
De mporouse, sxetizomenos kat' auton ton tropo tous trigurw tou, na diakrinei poioi ton timousan pragmatika kai poioi ton upeblepan.
Ap' auth th skopia eidwmeno, to epeisodio ths swthrias tou apo tous sunwmotes, pou phgan na ton sullaboun sto e3oxiko palati, prepei na 8ewrh8ei ws korufwma mhtrikhs storghs, ths agaphmenhs tou Zwhs tou Zaoutza, pou skubontas apo to para8uro, prwth auth antilhf8hke ton epapeiloumeno kinduno. An den ton eniw8e san paidi ths ton Leonta, pote de 8a ton protimouse antikru ston patera kai t' adelfia ths, pou eixan 3eshkw8ei na ton xalasoun.
Meta, o tropos pou sunhye thn sun8hkh eirhnhs, me ton barbaro ex8ro, pou diagoumizontas thn upai8ro, eixe ftasei mexri pro twn teixwn ths Basilidos twn Polewn, einai entelws paidikos. Opws ta paidia pou ta tromazei h bia, frontizoun na apallagoun apo ton kinduno, kanontas diafora dwra ston dunatotero, kalese s' ena palati e3w apo ta kastra, ton epikefalhs twn epidromewn, se plousio geuma kai afou sunefagan, tou xarise ta ashmenia kai xrusa epitrapezia skeuh.
Den eniw8e ton eauto tou ikano, na ta bganei pera paleuontas me kanenan. Oxi mono san paidi pou htan, alla kati perissotero, san paidi orfano, dixws patera pou na mporei na ton prostateusei panw sth ghs.
San pateras tou o Basileios ton timwrhse austhra kai ane3etasta. O Mixahl kai prin akomh pe8anei, adiaforouse gi' auton mexri tou shmeiou n' agnoei thn upar3h tou.
"Pateres, paidia, de bargiesai" skeftotan, "oloi brazoume sto idio kazani. To eleos parexei kai thn swthria, mono o en Ouranois Pathr kai en t' autw Yios kai Paraklhtos".
Se tetoies skeyeis prepei n' apodwsoume, thn spoudaioterh isws pra3h tou biou tou. Eu8us pou meta ton 8anato tou Basileiou analabe thn e3ousia, espeuse na diata3ei kai meteferan, mesa se kuparissenio glwssokomo, me pomph epishmh, yalmwdies, 8umiamata, keria kai lampades, to askhma parathmeno, sthn katenanti meria tou Bosporou, diamelismeno koufari tou Αutokratora Mixahl.
O plh8usmos ths Kwnstantinoupolhs kai olhs ths Or8odo3hs Xristianikhs epikrateias, plhroforoumenos ta panta peri tou Basilews tou, s' auton apedwse thn idrush mnhmeiou, pou sta xronia mas akoma sxetikh paradosh, to apokalei "xera ths dikaiosunhs". H leitourgia ths ek sumpagous metallou texnhths auths xeiros, htan o asfalesteros kai pleon adiablhtos diakanonismos, gia ka8e meta3u twn politwn diafora.

10. To Pasxa me8aurio. 8a 3ekourastw. 8a ginw allos an8rwpos. Prosdokwntas thn ta3h katebainw sth 8alassa. To fws, kanthli ekklhsias mprosta sta eikonismata, me gemizei erwta. Ola ta pragmata tou kosmou, gampriatikh stolh pou th forw.
Fresko nero ta bhmata. Oi leuteres fternes poulia. Patounakia triantafullia, mikrhs gatoulas ston khpo. Dixws fobo kanena proxwrei, pros ton skouriasmeno teneke twn skoupidiwn. Skubei kai koita. Skontaftoun kai mperdeuontai ta podia. Kladia dendrwn agkaliasta. Fidi kako den uparxei sthn aulh. Mia petalouda paei apo to 'na louloudi st' allo. Parallazei h petalouda se mati mosxariou, pou maswntas to xortari, stoxazetai oti megalwnontas, 8a ginei mia agelada paxeia, me polu gala, m' ena xalka sth muth na thn sernoun. "Mou kai Mou me th liakada" sta leibadia. Dipla mia grafh s' ena fullo xarti. Koitaei dipla gia na thn 3edialunei. To xarti ginetai manthli aspro kai m' auto apo makrua xaireta.
3aplwmenh sto leibadi, stoxazetai oti einai mia elafos, pou proskalei to fws. Foraei kapello ena louloudi me enwmena petala. To nazi ths zestainei, thn ka8eth eu8eia ths arxaias kolwnas. Foraei sto marmaro mia truferh gouna. H gampa tou agalmatos, xortainontas hlio, kobetai h mish kai ta3ideuei sta kumata, fregada or8opleurh. Eleu8erh apo ta ergaleia ths mastorikhs sto karnagio.
De fobatai oti to prioni mporei na thn xwrisei se spondulous, sa mian arxaia pesmenh sthlh. Einai ena dentro pou zei kai traneuei. Den 8' afhkei to roloi me ta granazia tou, na ths 8erisei tis mpoukles ths plousias fullwsias, tou para3enou dasous. Prosexei mhn tuxei kai mashsoun ta dontia ths xwmata.

To allo swma, th zestainei kai bganei apo panw ths th zaketta kai to xrwmatisto manthli tou laimou. To podi apo to pisto zwo agkulw8hke apo t' astro, pou kratage kleisto to sth8os. Mes' ap' thn ntantella twn kladiwn, duo aspra probata gia armegma ston oboro. Ths peftei h sarpa apo to 'na pleuro, afhnontas gumno to mpratso ews th masxalh. Ta gumna laima kumatizoun, ourania shmaia ane3arthsias. Axtides xruses ta mallia, zestainoun tous wmous. Paramikres nerofakes shmadeuoun to diaba tou hliou. Dipla ston enan ka8refth pou ta proswpa blepontai, mia olostroggulh elha.

Tou xamogela kai trigurw tou petoune poulia. Anebainei st' alogo kai me to kamoutsi, dernei ton anemo.
Kumata agkaliazoun tou braxou ta ufala. Errif8h o kubos. Mia astraph to filhma, kai metwpo, matia, muth, stoma, to proswpo oloklhro ginetai ekklhsia. Polla filia kai ta ufanta ein' etoima. 3aplwnei ths kalomannas to paidi kai xortainei gala. Ta flwria pou 'xe sto giorntani, stolizoun twra to mwro.

H mhtera mou stis xares ths, me thn eukairia ths megalhs giorths,

3espasa klwtswntas ta epipla kai espasa to podi mias kareklas.

"Ti na kanei twra h dustuxh; Pws 8a mporesw pia na thn 3anantikrusw; O 8eos na thn exei gerh kai na mh ths sumbei allo kako".

13. Ti einai mia mera giorths; H sugkekrimenh hmera ths megalhs giorths ths Lamprhs tou 1940; H hmera pou hr8e meta apo alles saranta ennha. Saranta ennha xwrismenes se epta meres. Epta ebdomades. 8a diabei grhgora ki' auth;
De ginetai na einai diaforetikh apo tis alles, megaluterh, na mh gurei o hlios braduazontas, paradinontas thn sto skotadi.
Αutos einai o fusikos tropos tou skeptes8ai.

Den eimaste se 8esh na katalaboume ton aiwnio xarakthra tou shmera kai apelpizomaste. Mas parasernei h dinh, h trikumia twn omoiomorfwn hmerwn. Ta pragmata gia mena epayan na einai alh8eia.
Eimai xwrismenos sta duo. Anamesa sta duo kommatia einai to xasma, to gemato mexri apanw me parel8on zwhs. Auto me pei8ei kai omilw, gia thn aiwnia xara en Xristw pou einai h monh alh8eia, h pantotinh mera, to fws tou skotous h o Logos.

14. 3hmerwse.
Katalabainw gia poio logo kataginomai me ta grammata. Giati prepei na a3iw8w na ginw suggrafeas. Enas aplos grafias, e3akolou8wntas ka8hmerinws na grafw ta panta. Den exw oute 3erw allo tropo, wste na mporesw na fula3w kai na diathrhsw thn pisth mou.

To nero mas kanei an8rwpous. Pauoume namaste antikeimena me wrismenes fusikes, fusiologikes kai yuxologikes idiothtes apokleistika. Apoxtame th dunamh na ekfrazomaste kai na ekfrazoume. Grafoume auto 'nai h ghs, h anoi3h ths, ta louloudia ths, h xloh. Blepoume ton Ourano kai katagrafoume th do3a tou Kuriou.
To amartwlo, 8nhto swma ma8ainontas na grafei, do3azetai. Do3azontas ton Ourano, kanei mia prospa8eia pou do3azei to idio. Prospa8eia pou mas e3omoiwnei me o,ti den eimaste.
Auto pou den eimaste, mas kanei h giorth ths Lamprhs. Perase h Kuriakh, alla olh thn ebdomada pou akolou8ei, oi nekroi de 8abontai me th sunh8h Akolou8ia, para me proe3arxonta logo s' auth to "Xristos Anesth".

Apo to Pasxa tou 1940 kai meta, posa xronia 8a xreiastei na grafw sunexeia, wste pe8ainontas na diel8w sthn en Xristw Αiwnia zwh;

15. Eimaste kiolas Paraskeuh ths Diakainhsimou.

O epwnumos ths Panagias Laodhghtrias ieros Naos ths 8essalonikhs, koinws onomazetai Panagia Lagoudianh.
To onoma auto h paradosh to sundeei me to zwo to lago, pou dihgh8hkame, oti einai noikokurhs, sumfwnws me osa 3eroun kai ma8ainoun ta paidia peri autou. 8elei loipon na pei h paradosh, oti enas lagos e3upnos kai noikokurhs s' ola tou, stalmenos kata eunoia ths Mhteras tou 8eou, odhghse to paidi pou eixe pesei sto lagoumi na brei th swsth die3odo. H mhtera tou pou to 'xe xameno, 8rhnouse aparhgorhth. Omws to paidi opws elege katopi, to eixe sthn agkalia ths h 8aumatourgos Panagia Lagoudianh.

H ermhneia auth exei to pleonekthma, na fernei konta to onoma tou zwou, pros to onoma tou ergaleiou labhs, tou timoniou pou koumanternei ta ploia.
Me auta kai m' auta, ftasame sthn epomenh ths Anastasews Kuriakh, pou edo8h h eukairia ston apistounta ma8hth, na anagnwrisei ton 8eo kai Kurio twn Dunamewn, banontas to xeri sta shmeia tou marturikou traumatismou, tou swmatos tou anastantos Yiou tou 8eou, Yiou tou an8rwpou.

«Fainetai o Kabo-Gata...», mou eipe o kapetanios
deixnontas ena xamhlo gialo mesa sto pousi
t’ adeio akrogiali anhmera Xristougenna,
«... kai kata ton Pounente alarga to kuma gennhse thn Αfrodith·
lene ton topo Petra tou Rwmiou.
Tria kartinia aristera!»
Εixe ta matia ths Salwmhs h gata pou exasa ton allo xrono
ki o Ramazan pws koitaze katamata to 8anato,
meres oloklhres mesa sto xioni ths Αnatolhs
ston pagwmenon hlio
katamata meres oloklhres o mikros efestios 8eos.
Mh sta8eis ta3idiwth.
«Tria kartinia aristera» mourmourise o timonierhs.
 
...isws o filos mou na kontostekountan,
3emparkos twra
kleistos s’ ena mikro spiti me eikones
gureuontas para8ura pisw ap’ ta kadra.
Xtuphse h kampana tou karabiou
san th moneda politeias pou xa8hke
ki hr8e na zwntaneyei peftontas
allotines elehmosunes.
 
«Para3eno», 3anaeipe o kapetanios.
«Touth h kampana ―mera pou einai―
mou 8umise thn allh ekeinh, th monasthrisia.
Dihgotane thn istoria enas kalogeros
enas misotrelos, enas oneiropolos.
 
»Ton kairo ths megalhs stegnias,
―saranta xronia anabroxia―
rhmaxthke olo to nhsi·
pe8aine o kosmos kai genniountan fidia.
Miliounia fidia touto t’ akrwthri,
xontra san to podari an8rwpou
kai farmakera.
To monasthri t’ Αi-Nikola to eixan tote
Αgiobasileites kalogeroi
ki oute mporousan na douleyoun ta xwrafia
ki oute na bgaloun ta kopadia sth boskh·
tous eswsan oi gates pou ana8refan.
Thn ka8e augh xtupouse mia kampana
kai 3ekinousan tsourmo gia th maxh.
Olh mera xtupiountan ws thn wra
pou shmainan to bradino tagini.
Αpodeipna pali h kampana
kai bgainan gia ton polemo ths nuxtas.
Htane 8auma na tis blepeis, lene,
allh koutsh, ki allh strabh, thn allh
xwris muth, xwris auti, probia koureli.
Etsi me tessereis kampanes thn hmera
perasan mhnes, xronia, kairoi ki alloi kairoi.
Agria peismatikes kai panta labwmenes
3olo8reyan ta fidia ma sto telos
xa8hkane· den ante3an toso farmaki.
Wsan karabi katapontismeno
tipote den afhsan ston afro
mhte niaourisma, mhte kampana.
Grammh! 
            Ti na sou kanoun oi talaipwres
paleuontas kai pinontas mera kai nuxta
to aima to farmakero twn erpetwn.
Αiwnes farmaki· genies farmaki».
«Grammh!» antilalhse adiaforos o timonierhs.

O Tzouan Biskounths eixe grayei thn alh8eia.
Pws plerwse maulistres o kounth Terouxas
pws bre8hkan antama autos ki h rhgaina
pws arxise to prama, pws 3eteleiwse,
ola ths Leukwsias ta kopelia
to dialalousan sta stena kai stis plateies.
Pws htan h grafh swsth pou esteile sth Fragkia sto rhga
to 3eran oi suboulatoroi.
Omws twra
sunaxthkan kai suntuxainan gia na subouleyoun
thn Korona ths Kuprou kai twn Ierosolumwn·

ap' th megalh th genia twn Katalanwn·
ki einai anelehmones oi Katalanoi

tipote de 8a to 'xan n' armatwsoun kai na 'r8oune
kai na tous 3olo8reyoun autous kai to bio tous.
Eixan eu8unes, tromeres eu8unes·
apo th gnwmh tous kremountan to rhgato.

Pws o Biskounths htan timios kai pistos

kai mproumuta ston po8o ths Linoras.

Htan mwros. Toulaxisto as 8umountan
pws esfale ki o rhgas· ekane to ligwmeno
ma eixe sto piswporti kai duo kauxes.

Anastatw8h to nhsi san h Linora

na grayei ti; gia kerata kai kriaria!
O fronimos th moira den thne 3agrieuei.
Oxi· den eimaste tagmenoi gia na poume
pou einai to dikio. To diko mas xreos
einai na broume to mikrotero kako.
Kallio enas na pe8anei apo to riziko tou
para se kintuno na mpoume emeis kai to rhgato.

Etsi subouleuontousan olh th mera
kai kata to basilema phgan sto rhga
proskunhsan kai tou eipan pws o Tzouan Biskounths
einai enas diastremmenos yematarhs.

Ki o Tzouan Biskounths pe8ane ap' thn peina se mia goufa.
Ma sthn yuxh tou rhga o sporos ths ntrophs tou
aplwne ta plokamia tou kai ton ekina
to 'pa8e na to pra3ei kai stous allous.
Kera den emeine pou na mh boulh8ei na thn porneyei·
tis ntropiase oles. Fobos ki extra zeugarwnan
kai gemizan th xwra fobo ki extra.

Etsi, me to "mikrotero kako", badize h moira
ws thn augh t' Agi' Antwniou, mera Tetarth
pou hr8an oi kabalarhdes kai ton esuran
apo ths kauxas tou thn agkalia kai ton esfa3an.
"Kai tapisa para oulous o tourkopoulierhs

Gia touta edwkes 8anaton!".
Auto to telos

Topio 8anatou. H petrwmenh 8alassa ta maura kuparissia

Htan kapoios apo th sunodeia pou ton antikrise
oxi o pio gerontas: Koitaxte o Elphnwr prepei nanai ekeinos.
Estriyame ta matia grhgora. Para3eno pws 8umh8hkame
afou eixe h mnhmh 3era8ei san potamia to kalokairi.
Htan autos o Elphnwr pragmati sta maura kuparissia
tuflos apo ton hlio kai tous stoxasmous
skalizontas thn ammo m' akrwthriasmena daxtula.
Kai tote ton efwna3a me mia xaroumenh fwnh: Elphnora
Elphnora pws bre8hkes 3afnou s' auth th xwra;
eixes teleiwsei me to mauro sidero mphgmeno sta pleura
ton persino xeimwna ki eidame sta xeilh sou to aima phxto
ka8ws estegnwne h kardia sou dipla stou skarmou to 3ulo.
M' ena koupi spasmeno se futeyame sthn akrh tou gialou
n' akous t' anemou to mourmourisma to rox8o ths 8alasshs.
Twra pws eisai toso zwntanos; pws bre8hkes s' auth th xwra
tuflos apo thn pikra kai tous stoxasmous;


De gurise na idei. Den akouse. Kai tote pali efwna3a
ba8ia tromazontas: Elphnora pouxes lagou malli
gia fulaxtari kremasmeno sto laimo sou Elphnora
xamene stis aperantes paragrafous ths istorias
egw se krazw kai sa sphlaio antilaloun ta sth8ia mou
pws hr8es file allotine pws mporeses
na ftaseis to katamauro karabi pou mas fernei

ton khpo ths Neraidas sbhmeno nostalgoune
kai klain tis anoi3iatikes efhmeres skies,

ta idia ta kinhmata, t' arga ki apelpismena,
pou 'xome mes sth luph mas ki emeis thn pio baria.

mes’ to bazo pou htan o mosxos

kai san poulia pou skiazontai mhn ta idei to geraki

ki oi kaballarhdes pernoun xwris na tis idoune…

o diskos tou hliou s’ orama, h selhnh,

sugkomismenos, se strofh, pilotou. 

Εkulage h zwh mou san t’ olofeggo

ki eklw8e ths mageias ta ufadia.

Limouzines me perierges blosures ekfraseis sto timoni

Agnwstes pou pernane ston plh8untiko
Zaxaroplasteia gemata erwthmatikes maties
Farmaka antidota gia ais8hmata asfu3ias

3upnhma prwino baru ashkwto h eudia8eto
3ekinhma gia mias kardias thn porta th stenh
Αlla kaneis sto spiti pou eipane pws emene
Trelh Souhdeza me matia sa fanaria
Αgwnes gia th Dhmokratia agwnes dromou kai agwnia
Misos aiwnas para tetarto kai kati akoma paraligo epanw mou.

«Εgw diais8anomoun oti 8a exoume taraxes. To pisteua apo kairo kai to eixa pei oti den 8a perasoume ton xeimwna hrema . Dioti uparxei oikonomikh duspragia, apo mia aperiskepth enwsh me to eurw pou egine pio nwris apo o,ti eprepe. Αuta einai mhnumata pou ta eisprattei kaneis oxi mono sto suneidhto alla kai sunais8hmatika. Ta ais8anetai sthn atmosfaira. H atmosfaira metatrepetai se glwssa. To poihma leitourgei san barometro. Αuth einai h leitourgia ths poihshs.»
Mesa se mia frash o poihths kai suggrafeas Nanos Balawriths, diseggonos tou poihth Αristotelh Balawrith, sumpuknwnei, milwntas ston «Ε.T.» th dikh tou eikona gia ta prosfata dramatika gegonota kai thn antidrash twn newn.
O diakekrimenos sthn Εllada kai sto e3wteriko logotexnhs pou exei timh8ei duo fores me to Kratiko Brabeio Poihshs alla kai to Brabeio ths Αmerikanikhs National Poetry Association (1996) suzhthse mazi mas gia ton polusuzhthmeno rolo twn pneumatikwn an8rwpwn stis koinwnikes kriseis, gia thn eswstrefeia ths logotexnias, gia ton mhdenismo twn newn, alla kai gia ton Mah tou ΄68 ton opoio o idios ezhse afou thn periodo ekeinh htan sth Gallia.
-Yparxei h ais8hsh oti o pneumatikos kosmos kwfeuei sta koinwnika mhnumata. Thn summerizes8e;
Kwfeuei dioti mh nomizete oti oi suggrafeis asxolountai me ta koina kai ta dhmosia. Idiwteuoun. Εinai stramenoi ston eauto tous. Narkiseuontai kai ta loipa,. Den endiaferontai kai polu gia to ti sumbainei gurw tous. Εndiaferontai mono gia tis asxolies kai auta pou aforoun tous idious. Oi poihtes einai mia mikrh meioyhfia h opoia epeidh h poihsh exei pio dhmosia leitourgia, emplekontai perissotero sta trexonta gegonota.
-Shmera h poihsh exei koinwnikes euais8hsies;
Shmera h strateumenh poihsh exei katargh8ei, den prepei omws kai na pesoume ston teleio narkissismo pou blepw se arketous apo autous pou 8eloun na ginoun poihtes. Enas au8entikos poihths prepei na exei tis keraies tou tentwmenes sta pragmata kai sta gegonota.
-Giati h logotexnia exei ginei eswstrefhs;
Prokeitai gia mia megalh pare3hghsh oti ka8esai kai grafeis gia ta eswtera sou. Den einai auto h poihsh. H poihsh einai ena pragma pou uparxei hdh anamesa se sena kai ston kosmo. Den ekfrazeis mono ton eauto sou me thn poihsh. Εkfrazeis thn ikanothta sou na xrhsimopoieis th glwssas. Meta to monternismo o ka8enas 8ewrei oti mporei na grayei poihsh, giati den uparxoun kanones. O ka8enas bgazei poihtikes sulloges. Omws auta den einai poihmata, einai eswstrefeis skeyeis pou den exoun kai megalo endiaferon. Dustuxws polloi ekdotes bgazoun kata seira tetoies sulloges.
-H poihsh 8a mporouse na dwsei die3odous stis anhsuxies kai ta adie3oda twn newn;
Sigoura. Shmera uparxei agxos kai ena eidos apelpisias pou katalhgei sto mhdenismo. Αuto einai epikinduno.. Ofeilei na enisxusei kaneis thn pisth sto idewdes kai sthn outopia pou estw ki an den mporei na pragmatopoih8ei prepei na meinei zwntanh sth kardia enos neou gia na mhn pesei sthn kata8liyh. Αuto kataktatai duskola. H poihsh dinei th dunatothta na dei kaneis pio pera apo thn muth tou. Na koita3ei ston kosmo ths, pou mporei na einai idanikos, alla uparxei mesa mas. Αpo mas e3artatai na ploutisoume th zwh mas. H dhmiourgikothta einai fusikh sto paidi kai sto nearo efhbo an den tou thn xalasoun apo polu nwris oi megaloi.
-Ston Mah tou ’68 hsastan sth Gallia. Yparxoun omoiothtes me auto pou sumbainei shmera sthn Εllada;
Sth Gallia epeidh h e3egersh phre empneush apo tis mikres poihtikes omades twn uperrealistwn, to kallitexniko epipedo htan arketa uyhlo wste na mhn peripesoun se agnoia kai se xudaiothta sun8hmatwn. Ta sun8hmata htan polu empneusmena, me xioumor, me dhmiourgikothta. Εpishs den eixan to monopwlio oi biaies omades, pou uphrxan kai tote. Oi Galloi anarxikoi den balane fwties, den spasane epipla, den kanane katoxes pou den eixan didaktiko xarakthra. Αfhsan tous an8rwpous eleu8erous na suzhthsoun.
-Yparxei kati pou sas dida3e o uperrealismos se proswpiko epipedo;
O uperrealismos me sthri3e meta ton Εmfulio. Oi uperrealistes me dida3an oti den prepei kaneis na afhnei akomh kai ena anekplhrwto idaniko gia na mhn katakrhmnis8ei kai o idios..
